abortion  slepian	the slaying of dr. barnett slepian in his home last week eliminated the mainstay of the only abortion clinic here , but it has not eliminated women 's access to abortion . </s><s> that is because the availability of abortion in the buffalo area , as in much of the united states , is a complex reality , one affected by class and education , medical training and the personal convictions of individual doctors . </s><s> knowledgeable middle-class and affluent women here who find themselves with an unwanted pregnancy can usually obtain an abortion from their private gynecologists , or if a gynecologist has a personal objection to the procedure , through a referral to a colleague . </s><s> women who are poor , young or uneducated and have no such regular relationships with doctors have to rely on specialized clinics like the one slepian worked in , or on hospitals . </s><s> it is this group _ for whom unplanned pregnancies are far more common than for prosperous women _ that faces a shrinking universe of possibilities as a result of the fear set off by slepian 's killing and the slayings of five other doctors and clinic workers since 1993 , medical experts said . </s><s> `` if you 're well off and well connected , you can get your abortion , '' said dr. stephen wear , co-director of the center for clinical ethics at the university of buffalo , which trains doctors for the buffalo area 's hospitals . </s><s> `` for everybody else , it 's less and less available . '' </s><s> the number of abortions in the united states has been declining steadily since the first years after the supreme court 's roe vs. wade decision legalized abortion in 1973 , according to the alan guttmacher institute , which studies reproductive issues . </s><s> they now number roughly 1.5 million a year , according to reports by guttmacher , or 1.4 million , according to the national right to life committee , the nation 's largest anti-abortion group , which calculates its estimate partly from the guttmacher figures . </s><s> the number of providers who identify themselves as performing abortions as part of their practice is diminishing as well . </s><s> a 1994 guttmacher study , the last one published , found that the number had decreased 18 percent between 1982 and 1992 , to 2,380 from 2,908 . </s><s> moreover , the study said , only 12 percent of the nation 's residency programs routinely offer training in abortions during the first trimester , though many do offer elective courses . </s><s> laura echevarria , director of media relations for the national right to life committee , contends , however , that most teaching hospitals do train gynecologists in procedures for treating miscarriages that are similar to those used for performing abortions . </s><s> only in cosmopolitan and comparatively liberal cities like new york does the availability of abortions continue at a steady level , experts say , though even in these locales there is concern about the decreasing number of young doctors who emerge from residencies fully trained in performing abortions . </s><s> the guttmacher institute , which keeps the nation 's most precise statistics , said that in 1992 , the last year for which it has figures , there were 142,410 abortions in new york that were done by just 151 providers , including 61 hospitals and 44 clinics . </s><s> still , that provider figure greatly understates the number of private doctors who perform them in their offices , medical experts say . </s><s> `` many obstetricians and gynecologists in manhattan provide abortions as part of their palette of services , and have for many years , '' said dr. richard hausknecht , the medical director of planned parenthood . </s><s> `` rich and middle-class women have always had access to abortions , and they always will . '' </s><s> the major threat to availability in the city is less a result of anti-abortion violence than of medical training . </s><s> `` the bottom line is that we 're facing an impending shortage of physicians who are adequately trained and willing to do the procedures , '' said dr. john choate , chairman of the new york state division of the american college of obstetricians and gynecologists . </s><s> but the lack of training programs is also a result of political pressures on hospitals and universities by antagonists of abortion and the same climate of fear . </s><s> `` physicians tend to lie low , '' choate said . </s><s> `` they do n't publicize the fact that they do them . </s><s> if they do them , they do it quietly out of fear for their practice and for their lives . '' </s><s> one development on the horizon that is expected to change the outlook for abortions substantially is final federal approval , expected next year , of the ru-486 pill , the drug that ends an early pregnancy without the need for surgery . </s><s> when the pill was introduced in france and in edinburgh , scotland , hausknecht said , the number of surgical abortions plummeted .	slaying of dr. slepian , abortion clinic mainstay , will not stop abortions	murder of dr. slepian will not eliminate women 's access to abortion	number of abortions and providers decline ; politics , fear ; easy for rich	guttmacher , medical training , ru-486 , availability of abortions , slepian

s slaying	fbi want kopp  information abortion doctor s murder  danger violence	antiabortionist james kopp want material witness slepian killing	federal authorities investigating the murder of a buffalo-area obstetrician who performed abortions have identified a vermont man as a material witness to the sniper attack last month and issued a warrant for his arrest wednesday to bring him in for questioning . </s><s> the man was identified as james charles kopp , 44 , whose last known address was in st. albans , vt. his whereabouts are not known , investigators said . </s><s> investigators said kopp 's car was seen near the amherst , n.y. , home of dr. barnett slepian in the weeks before the doctor , whose work at an abortion clinic had long made him a target of harassment , was killed . </s><s> kopp , according to police records and abortion rights groups , has often moved about the country in a series of protests at abortion clinics , and has been linked to an underground manual that describes methods of killing or maiming doctors who perform abortions . </s><s> denise o'donnell , the u.s. attorney for the western district of new york , said kopp was not considered a suspect at this time but was believed to have information material to the case . </s><s> she declined to give details on what evidence was being sought from kopp , describing it only as information that is contained in a sealed affidavit whose disclosure would compromise the ongoing investigation . </s><s> ms. o'donnell said that federal law allowed for an arrest warrant for a material witness when a person has information that is important to a case . </s><s> `` if kopp is found , he would be arrested , brought to buffalo and ordered to provide the required evidence , '' ms. o'donnell said . </s><s> `` then , most likely , the individual would be released . '' </s><s> slepian , 52 , was shot by a sniper firing from outside his home on oct. 23 , shortly after returning from an evening service at his synagogue . </s><s> he was standing in his kitchen with his wife and one of his four sons when the bullet crashed through a back window . </s><s> he died two hours later . </s><s> law enforcement officials said wednesday 's announcement of the material witness warrant was in part an attempt to underscore the potential danger of anti-abortion violence in advance of remembrance day , a canadian holiday that falls on nov. 11 and that the authorities have associated with some anti-abortion crimes . </s><s> at the same time , the justice department and the fbi were trying to find ways to step up the federal response to violence at abortion clinics in the aftermath of the slepian killing . </s><s> the officials said that attorney general janet reno would soon announce that the justice department , aiming to heighten the visibility of the federal role in cases that cross state and local jurisdictional boundaries , would revive a national investigative effort focused on abortion clinic violence . </s><s> ms. reno and senior fbi officials , including robert bryant , the deputy fbi director , have met with physician and abortion rights groups in recent days to discuss ways to enhance federal investigative efforts and coordination with local agencies . </s><s> federal authorities first organized an abortion clinic task force in 1995 after the killing of a florida doctor . </s><s> the unit , which was charged with investigating whether a national conspiracy existed , spent nearly two years studying abortion clinic violence . </s><s> the unit disbanded without uncovering a national conspiracy . </s><s> law enforcement officials said that the unit 's operation did help reduce violence at abortion clinics and that , in part , the decision to re-establish it was prompted by ms. reno 's desire to send a renewed message to anti-abortion extremists that the government would aggressively investigate these crimes . </s><s> slepian 's murder fit the pattern of four earlier sniper attacks on abortion doctors in canada and western new york , dating from 1994 . </s><s> none of the attacks have been solved . </s><s> bernard tolbert , special agent in charge of the fbi in buffalo , said at a news conference here wednesday that investigators had not determined whether there is a link between the five killings . </s><s> `` there 's a possibility they could be linked , but certainly no information , '' he said . </s><s> tolbert gave little information about the subject of the material-witness warrant , except to say that kopp 's black 1987 chevrolet cavalier , with the vermont license plate bpe216 , was seen near slepian 's home beginning several weeks before the murder . </s><s> `` we do n't have any idea of where he is , '' tolbert said of kopp . </s><s> `` we are looking for him every place we can , every place he might be . '' </s><s> a photograph of kopp taken in january 1997 has been distributed to law enforcement agencies around the united states and canada . </s><s> the national abortion federation has sent out an advisory to clinics around the country about the search for kopp , said melinda dubois , assistant director of womenservices , the clinic where slepian worked . </s><s> she said naming kopp a material witness in the case had not brought relief to the nurses and other workers at the clinic . </s><s> `` i do n't think it makes me or anyone else at the clinic feel differently , '' she said . </s><s> `` i do n't want anybody to relax and say , `oh god , they got the guy . ' </s><s> that 's easy to happen . </s><s> i still want people to be very vigilant . '' </s><s> the clinic is the last in the buffalo area that is performing abortions . </s><s> slepian was one of only a handful of doctors in buffalo who were still willing to perform the procedure in the face of pickets , protesters and threats . </s><s> since his death , doctors from outside buffalo have come to the clinic to continue providing abortion services .	james kopp named as material witness in slaying of abortion doctor	fbi names james kopp as material witness in abortion doctor 's slaying	fbi wants kopp ; information on abortion doctor 's murder ; danger of violence	anti-abortionist james kopp wanted as material witness in slepian killing

outside buffalo s abortion clinic	nonviolent abortion protestor regular presence buffalo clinic	abortion protestors violent  avoid militancy  use prayer  talk	lotempio  womenservices  spring life  operation rescue  buffalo  clinic	rosina lotempio was standing outside abortion clinics here before operation rescue stormed into town in 1992 for the rowdy spring of life rallies , in which hundreds were arrested . </s><s> she was there before lambs of christ demonstrators came to town in 1993 . </s><s> she was on the sidewalk outside buffalo gyn womenservices the morning of oct. 23 , about 12 hours before barnett slepian , the clinic doctor , was fatally shot in his home . </s><s> and she was there friday , brown rosary beads in her hands , a small gold cross on a chain around her neck , quietly praying for abortions to stop . </s><s> `` i 'm heartbroken when i have to come here , '' mrs. lotempio , 58 , said as she stood in the cold , wearing small black earmuffs and a white turtleneck adorned with a tiny silver pin of baby feet . </s><s> `` it 's very difficult out here ; i depend on god , '' she said , after praying for several moments to decide whether to talk to a reporter . </s><s> the bombings , the fiery rhetoric of abortion opponents and the posters of bloody fetuses may capture the attention of the news media , but people like mrs. lotempio are the foot soldiers in the abortion battle . </s><s> they call themselves street counselors and come to the clinic whenever they believe abortions are being performed . </s><s> they pray and they talk to women , hoping to change their minds . </s><s> some scream profanities . </s><s> others , like mrs. lotempio , denounce not only the violence against doctors and clinics , but also the blocking of doors and the shouting of ugly epithets at clinic workers and patients . </s><s> for the approximately 80 abortion opponents here , their protest is more like a job than a political activity . </s><s> there is a schedule . </s><s> people count on them to show up . </s><s> mrs. lotempio , a mother of three and grandmother of six , connects her involvement to a conversation in the 1970s in which she helped a friend decide to abort an unwanted pregnancy . </s><s> two decades later , she was haunted by her own question : whether the fetus was male or female . </s><s> `` i just felt horrible and i felt guilty , '' she said , tears in her eyes . </s><s> `` i thought that if i was at the clinic doing something , i could make up for that baby 's life . '' </s><s> during mrs. lotempio 's 8 a.m.-to-10 a.m. shift friday , about a dozen people circled the area in front of the buffalo clinic , saying the `` hail mary . '' </s><s> others take her spot on tuesdays and wednesdays . </s><s> she returns on saturdays , when up to 40 people crowd the sidewalk . </s><s> similar bands of protesters march in front of abortion clinics throughout the united states , and local protesters are often joined by bands of people who roam the country . </s><s> at the clinic on main street , north of downtown buffalo , there is an odd sense of community . </s><s> local protesters greet dick , the security guard , by name . </s><s> they sometimes see the `` enemy '' _ abortion-rights volunteers who escort patients in and out of the clinic _ in the supermarket or on the soccer field . </s><s> robert behn , one of the protest leaders , even spent two hours talking about abortion over breakfast last year with slepian . </s><s> and several said they cried when they heard of slepian 's death . </s><s> most of the protesters , including mrs. lotempio , were among the thousands of people arrested here in 1992 , the height of anti-abortion activity in buffalo . </s><s> but if operation rescue returns , as planned , for a spring of life reunion in april , mrs. lotempio said , she will not be there . </s><s> instead , she plans to stay in church and pray , to avoid the militancy she says she finds uncomfortable . </s><s> glenn murray , a lawyer for womenservices clinic , said : `` when people from out of town show up , that is when we feel the most danger . </s><s> the local people are a known quantity . </s><s> we know most of the local people by name . '' </s><s> buffalo has been among a handful of hot spots for abortion protesters for the last decade . </s><s> it is a heavily catholic city where thousands of protesters from around the country demonstrated for two weeks in 1992 . </s><s> they failed to close abortion clinics , but 500 people were arrested in rallies that snarled traffic and drew national headlines . </s><s> those rallies , as well as earlier protests and continuing sidewalk vigils , have had an impact , people on both sides of the abortion issue say . </s><s> the number of clinics performing abortions in the buffalo area has dropped to one from three . </s><s> and after slepian 's death and the retirement this week of another doctor , there are only two doctors in the area for whom abortions form a significant part of their practices . </s><s> the daily demonstrators count this as progress . </s><s> but their perch outside the clinic means they witness far more of what they believe are murders than what they call rescues . </s><s> about 30 women a day might go into the clinic . </s><s> after eight years , mrs. lotempio can count eight women who changed their minds and did not get abortions while she was at the clinic . </s><s> inside the clinic , the protests just make a hard job harder , many clinic workers say . </s><s> while some demonstrators simply repeat the rosary , other protesters call out to patients as they drive into the parking lot behind the building , or walk up to the fortresslike front . </s><s> they ask questions like `` do you know what your baby looks like ? '' </s><s> or `` is it a boy or a girl ? '' </s><s> sometimes they accuse people of murder and torture and sin , or threaten them with damnation . </s><s> federal law bars protesters from coming within 15 feet of the clinic entrances , and from leaning signs against its walls . </s><s> some push the limits , frustrating clinic workers and guards . </s><s> the rules protect people from physical harassment , but because of the distance , they turn what could be quiet conversations into catcalls and taunts . </s><s> when a patient goes into the clinic , the protesters `` take on a different persona , '' said melinda dubois , director of the buffalo clinic . </s><s> `` they scream and yell and call us names . </s><s> they lie . </s><s> some days we 're immune to it , but other days it 's just too much . '' </s><s> linda palm , 51 , marching at the clinic on friday , said she identified with the clinic patients . </s><s> when she was 23 , she said , she struggled with the difficulties of being unmarried and pregnant herself , but decided to have her child , and married the father . </s><s> she began protesting in 1990 , after attending an abortion protest march in albany .	cadre of faithful keep vigil outside buffalo 's abortion clinic	non-violent abortion protestor is a regular presence at buffalo clinic	not all abortion protestors violent ; some avoid militancy ; use prayer , talk	lotempio , womenservices , spring of life , operation rescue , buffalo , clinic

clinic	on the eve of a holiday that has been linked to antiabortion violence , the authorities on tuesday were investigating whether a picture of an aborted fetus sent to a canadian newspaper was connected to last month 's fatal shooting of a buffalo , n.y. doctor who provided abortions or four similar attacks in western new york and canada since 1994 . </s><s> the newspaper , the hamilton ( ontario ) spectator , has received five similar packages in the last year , some containing veiled threats and several delivered by a man who employees said resembled james charles kopp , who is wanted for questioning as a witness about the oct. 23 slaying of dr. barnett slepian . </s><s> five days after the shooting , the spectator received a package containing an antiabortion flier with biographical information about slepian , including a photograph of him that had been crossed out . </s><s> `` it certainly causes us to be more interested than ever in speaking to kopp , '' said inspector keith mckaskill of the winnipeg police department , a spokesman for the canada-united states task force investigating the five shootings . </s><s> even as they searched for kopp , federal officials were also looking into three letters that were received monday by catholic and antiabortion organizations in buffalo , indianapolis and chicago . </s><s> those letters , saying they contained the deadly anthrax bacteria , came 10 days after eight similar threats to clinics that provide abortions . </s><s> all the letters appear to be hoaxes , and it remains unclear whether they were connected to any of the five shootings . </s><s> kopp is not a suspect in the shootings . </s><s> an itinerant antiabortion activist whose last known address is in vermont , he is the subject of warrants on both sides of the border . </s><s> in canada , he is suspected of administrative violations of immigration law ; in the united states , he is wanted as a material witness in the slepian case .	anti-abortion flyer in canada may be related to buffalo clinic slaying	canada-us task force investigating five anti-abortion shootings	anti-abortion threats , some to newspapers ; anthrax hoaxes ; kopp in canada ?	hamilton ( ontario ) spectator , abortion , kopp , slepian , anthrax , clinics

baby</s><s>question doctor child	antiabortion group open home itinerant demonstrator	abortion opponent open home itinerant antiabortion demonstrator	travel antiabortion protestors aid local  prayer blockade	hayes  lamb christ  weslin  kopp  quinn  rochester  catholic church	by outward appearances , dorothy hayes ' life seems ordinary . </s><s> she and her family live in a rambling old home on the shore of lake ontario , and every morning , she gives her husband , john , a peck on the cheek before he goes to work . </s><s> she runs errands , like other suburban moms , and spends much of her day taking care of her children . </s><s> but one thing sets mrs. hayes apart from her neighbors . </s><s> as a devoted opponent of abortion , the 43-year-old mother of nine regularly plays host to a series of traveling speakers , priests and protesters _ many of whom have come to rochester intent upon spreading the word against abortion and shutting down clinics that provide it . </s><s> she is one of thousands of people across the country loosely associated with anti-abortion groups like the lambs of christ who have opened their homes to the lambs ' founder , the rev . </s><s> norman weslin , and other itinerant demonstrators . </s><s> while many _ including mrs. hayes _ disavow violent tactics , supporters of abortion rights say that people like her bear some responsibility when the protesters they help blockade clinics or threaten doctors . </s><s> `` these people who provide father weslin with food and shelter when he comes into town to close the clinics are not innocent , '' said ann glazier , the director of clinic defense for the planned parenthood federation . </s><s> `` it 's just not credible to say they are n't part of the extremist activity that is taking place at these clinics . </s><s> they are still guilty of interfering with women 's access . '' </s><s> but mary quinn , a local organizer for the lambs of christ who also offers her home to protesters , sees matters in a differing light . </s><s> `` taking people in like this is an act of christian charity , '' mrs. quinn said . </s><s> `people who travel around the country doing this work are taken in by those of us that who do n't want to lose their stupid houses . </s><s> we take in these people because they are willing to make the sacrifice . '' </s><s> members of the lambs of christ have been persistent figures in protests at the buffalo women 's clinic where dr. barnett slepian worked before he was shot to death last month . </s><s> although no suspect has been identified in the shooting or in several similar attacks in new york and canada over the past several years , officials are looking to question a vermont man whose car was seen near dr. slepian 's home . </s><s> that man , james charles kopp , has participated in abortion protests for more than a decade , and often was a house guest of other members of the lambs of christ . </s><s> while mrs. hayes says she would never so much as obstruct a clinic 's door , some of those to whom she has given refuge have no qualms about doing so . </s><s> weslin , the leader of the lambs of christ , is one of those who has benefited from mrs. hayes ' hospitality , a modern version of the generosity that christ and the apostles knew well . </s><s> he prides himself on being arrested more than 60 times during protests in front of medical clinics . </s><s> and throughout the 1980s and early '90s , he was active in clinic `` rescues , '' in which protesters tried physically to restrain patients trying to enter clinics . </s><s> weslin stayed at mrs. hayes ' home only once , beginning in may 1996 when he first came to speak at local churches about the anti-abortion movement . </s><s> but during a stay that lasted several months , he was arrested on federal charges of blocking access to a rochester health clinic where abortions were performed . </s><s> he was later convicted and served two and a half months in prison . </s><s> during the protest outside the clinic , he and several other protesters locked themselves in a homemade contraption called `` the oven , '' made of cement and iron . </s><s> it took police officers several hours to lug the device to a horse trailer that carted it off . </s><s> at the same protest , one man glued his head to a lock on a gate surrounding the clinic , a move some protesters later said was an accident . </s><s> abortion opponents like mrs. hayes and mrs. quinn speak of attending peaceful observances at abortion clinics and offering prayers for the unborn . </s><s> they talk about counseling women about alternatives to abortion at roman catholic `` pregnancy centers , '' and their support of anti-abortion candidates . </s><s> but they also say they saw nothing wrong with weslin trying to block access to clinics . </s><s> they describe the activity as peaceful resistance meant to stop what they see as murders . </s><s> weslin and the other house guests of mrs. hayes and mrs. quinn come recommended from friends and members of local catholic churches , they said , adding that most are speakers at local churches or anti-abortion events . </s><s> and although they say they would never take into their homes a stranger wanted by the fbi , like kopp , they concede that they sometimes know little about their guests . </s><s> but mrs. hayes and mrs. quinn say they know a lot about weslin . </s><s> an army veteran , he has been a leader of the anti-abortion movement for more than 25 years , they say , and founded a home for unwed mothers . </s><s> mrs. hayes said that when she met him , it was obvious he was a man of peace who `` had a tremendous devotion to the blessed mother and basically recognized that we are helpless lambs . '' </s><s> barbara fredericks , another local abortion opponent who developed ties to the lambs after weslin came to town , added that the priest epitomized a man of god . </s><s> `` i just knew when i looked at his holy shoes and his simple coat that had been mended 50 times , '' she said . </s><s> `` he was humble , a man who was doing this for a higher purpose , trying to save people through sacrifice and prayer . '' </s><s> opp also has robust defenders among the people who housed him as he rode about the country from protest to protest . </s><s> e. kenny , 20 , said that his parents housed kopp in their st. albans , vt. , home for two years after he spoke at their local church in 1988 . </s><s> during kopp 's stay , he was a pleasure , kenny said , always helping around the house . </s><s> `` he was a nice guy , kind of like an uncle to us , '' kenny said . </s><s> `` he 'd sit around and play video games with us and make us model planes out of wood . '' </s><s> like weslin , kopp was consumed by a need to fight abortion and often talked about its evils , kenny said , adding that kopp was a gentle man who wanted to become a catholic priest . </s><s> `` he was always in a good mood , '' kenny said . </s><s> `` he never did anything violent at all . '' </s><s> both kopp and weslin have been arrested repeatedly during abortion protests . </s><s> the men have moved in the same circles and at times found themselves arrested at the same events . </s><s> mrs. quinn said that weslin told her in a recent telephone conversation that he knew kopp . </s><s> weslin could not be reached for comment , but it is clear that the two men have encountered each other . </s><s> both faced misdemeanor charges after blocking a burlington , vt. , health clinic in 1990 that kopp called `` the mill . '' </s><s> and they spent time in the same jail in atlanta in 1988 after a clinic protest . </s><s> slepian 's death has abortion opponents like mrs. hayes and mrs. quinn worried , both about how the killing is being portrayed in the media and what it will do to membership in groups like the lambs of christ . </s><s> `` for a long time , you felt like the voice in the desert that was n't being heard , '' mrs. hayes said . </s><s> `` and then there was this horrible tragedy of this doctor 's death becoming the face of the movement . </s><s> `` we 're about saving lives , '' she said . </s><s> the fbi has not talked to mrs. hayes , but kenny said that agents have spoken to him . </s><s> the justice department says that a federal task force set up this week to investigate the killing of slepian is looking for evidence connecting anti-abortion violence at various clinics . </s><s> `` it 's fair to say that when investigating these events , we will look at any connection between individuals engaged in criminal conduct , '' myron marlin , a spokesman for the department , said . </s><s> many local catholics associated with the lambs of christ have tried to distance themselves from the killing of slepian . </s><s> they are mailing literature saying that the killer does not represent their movement . </s><s> in addition , some people associated with the lambs are offering other possible explanations for the killing . </s><s> some say they believe that the killer might have been someone overcome by grief after a personal experience with abortion . </s><s> others wondered whether the shooter had tried to wound the doctor to scare him or prevent him from performing more abortions . </s><s> the lambs also wonder whether abortionist opponents are being blamed for a shooting committed by a disgruntled patient . </s><s> one idea gaining currency among the lambs , and prominently displayed on their web site , suggests that the killing was the result of a plot by abortion supporters to discredit abortion opponents just before last week 's elections . </s><s> mrs. hayes says she does n't know the truth . </s><s> `` there are wackos who travel around and they may be in front of the clinic because we are drawn to the same place , '' she said . </s><s> `` but you do n't know everyone who shows up and you do n't turn to the person next to you and tell them they do n't belong there . '' </s><s> mrs. fredericks said that anyone who would shoot a doctor who provides abortions was someone `` who had snapped , perhaps because of the importance of the situation . '' </s><s> members of the lambs of christ and other opponents of abortion in rochester wonder whether the killing of slepian will hinder their efforts . </s><s> when weslin first arrived two years ago , he brought new focus to a group that often had done little more than counsel pregnant women and set up booths on college campuses , they said . </s><s> `` in many cities , they have a priest for life coordinating and leading rosary marches '' against abortion , mrs. quinn said . </s><s> `` but with father weslin coming here , we could finally come together and feel like we were doing something sacrificial as a group . '' </s><s> mrs. hayes said that she felt the first pull of the movement in the early 1980s , when she heard women speak about `` choice '' in regard to abortion . </s><s> then she saw `` silent scream , '' a well-known anti-abortion film that purports to show the footage of an abortion . </s><s> `` what i saw was the end of life , '' she said . </s><s> she began to volunteer at a catholic pregnancy center where she encouraged women `` not to kill their child . '' </s><s> she also began to house unwed mothers and went to stand vigil outside local clinics where abortions were performed . </s><s> mrs. hayes looked at her 3-month-old daughter , bernadette , then pointed to the prenatal image of the infant , a sonogram taken at 13 weeks that she keeps on her refrigerator door . </s><s> she described what could have been her baby 's fate , had she been someone else 's child . </s><s> `` two pounds and two inches ago , she could have been a partial-birth abortion , '' mrs. hayes said , referring to a controversial late-term abortion procedure . </s><s> `` they have the hardest time getting the shoulders out , so they can get to the head and puncture it . </s><s> `` it 's brutal , but what do you expect when the purpose is a dead baby ? </s><s> there 's no question that these doctors are trying to murder a child . `thanks	slain doctor support woman s right abortion matter principle	murder abortion doctor long time target abortion protestors	slain abortion doctor  unlikely martyr  unassuming  stubborn  woman s care	slepian  oct 23  sniper  obstetrics  abortion  schenck  murray  clinic	everyone who knew dr. barnett slepian knew that the slight , graying physician endured a measure of stress that would exhaust , even break , most people . </s><s> there were the strangers who pawed through the garbage cans at his home and growled `` murderer '' as they passed him in the grocery store aisle . </s><s> demonstrators assailed his pregnant patients as they arrived at his office for their checkups , calling him a baby killer . </s><s> outside the clinic where he performed abortions two days a week , pickets shouted epithets like `` pig '' to his face . </s><s> slepian , an obstetrician and gynecologist by training and an abortion doctor by principle , rarely acknowledged the strain . </s><s> he might crack an occasional joke at the expense of the protesters who shadowed him at work and on weekends . </s><s> then he would do something unexpected , like invite an anti-abortion leader to breakfast or stop and chat with a familiar demonstrator outside the clinic . </s><s> so when he was killed oct. 23 by a sniper 's bullet fired through the kitchen window of his home in the buffalo , n.y. , suburbs , a furtive execution that fit a pattern of four earlier attacks on abortion providers in western new york state and canada , friends and relatives wondered not so much that slepian 's work could arouse such murderous violence . </s><s> he had predicted as much himself . </s><s> instead , they wondered , once again , that he persisted in that work , long after other buffalo doctors had surrendered to the pressure of abortion opponents . </s><s> `` he was an incredibly fatalistic person who thought that if your number 's up , it 's up , and there is nothing you can do about it , '' said h. amanda robb , the doctor 's 32-year-old niece . </s><s> `` and he was incredibly stubborn . </s><s> he said that women had a right to comprehensive health care and since he was a women 's doctor , he was going to provide it for them . '' </s><s> slepian is the third doctor to be killed in the last five years in bombings and shootings that have killed 7 people and wounded 17 at abortion clinics around the nation . </s><s> to his tormentors , he was simply an abortion doctor . </s><s> to members of the abortion rights movement , he was a martyr for their cause . </s><s> but slepian was far from either . </s><s> in interviews with friends and family members , he emerges as more than a one-dimensional abstract _ a conservative who advocated old-fashioned values like self-reliance , a shy man who had rare flashes of anger , a doctor who performed abortions but had no more patience for women who had multiple abortions than for women who had multiple children they did not want or could not support . </s><s> he was killed because he performed a medical procedure that has become emotional and politicized . </s><s> yet there is nothing in his life to suggest he was a crusader in either politics or medicine . </s><s> rather , he was an obstinate , unassuming man who did a remarkable thing . </s><s> out of contrariness and out of conscience , say those who knew him , he refused to allow anyone to dictate what kind of doctor he should be , and for that , he paid with his life . </s><s> the clues to slepian 's flinty brand of commitment lie , in part , in his upbringing . </s><s> his was a family that took success for granted even as it teetered on the edge of poverty . </s><s> to earn money for medical school , he shoveled muck at a ranch and drove a taxi . </s><s> he made few friends , but those he had were friends for life . </s><s> when their wives were sick , he called repeatedly . </s><s> when they were lonely , he flew to their side . </s><s> slepian , who was known as bart , used to tell people that he chose obstetrics because it is a specialty that exposes a doctor to the least suffering , and that he performed abortions because it was legal and the alternatives were so much worse . </s><s> slepian often expressed exasperation over women who came to him for abortion after abortion . </s><s> `` do n't they get it ? '' </s><s> his clinic staff recall him saying more than once . </s><s> he had the same impatience for women like those he remembered from his residency in inner-city buffalo , who had child after child and no means of support . </s><s> `` he had the contempt for that of somebody who had pulled himself up by his bootstraps and made it in the world , '' ms. robb said . </s><s> he believed that to ban abortions or , just as shameful in his view , to stop teaching young doctors how to perform them , would not correct the human imperfections that he found so irritating . </s><s> `` there are 1.5 million abortions performed in this country , '' his niece said , `` and he just felt we 're not equipped to handle 1.5 million unwanted children . '' </s><s> when he was killed , at the age of 52 , bart slepian owned an imposing red brick home in the quiet suburb of amherst , complete with a swimming pool with piped-in music and an assortment of the time-saving gadgets he adored . </s><s> slepian 's trajectory to that comfortable doctor 's life had been unconventional . </s><s> his grandfather , a russian jewish immigrant who started out selling shoelaces from a pushcart in boston , propelled all five of his sons into harvard at a time when few jews met the university 's blue-blood standards . </s><s> his father , in turn , decreed that his own three sons would be doctors or earn ph.d 's . </s><s> `` we grew up in a home where there was tremendous , tremendous , tremendous respect for education , '' said serena robb , slepian 's sister , who is four years older than him . </s><s> `` if you got an a , it was ok if you got a b , you got yelled at . '' </s><s> the family 's means did not match its expectations . </s><s> slepian 's father , philip , had joined his own father 's business manufacturing leather soles for shoes . </s><s> soon after bart was born in 1946 in boston , the company failed , so to save money , the father moved his family of six to his in-laws ' apartment in mckeesport , pa. , and then to rochester , n.y. once settled , slepian 's father set himself up as a freelance writer , crisscrossing the country in his old studebaker , researching the origins of prominent citizens at the library of congress and writing their stories for small-town newspapers . </s><s> he sold articles by the hundreds , and was still writing until his death nine years ago at the age of 93 . </s><s> the success that was expected of bart slepian did not come easily . </s><s> as a child , he was so shy that he cried when anyone looked at him , his sister recalled . </s><s> an unexceptional student , he went to a local community college before transferring to the university of denver , where he majored in zoology . </s><s> rejected by medical schools in the united states _ the fate of two out of three applicants in the late 1960s _ he studied one year in belgium and then enrolled at the autonomous university for medicine in guadalajara , mexico . </s><s> his friends remember him as funny and obstinate , a thin young man with glasses and a receding hairline who beat all comers at arm-wrestling and pool . </s><s> `` bart had certain beliefs , strongly held , '' said richard schwarz , an old classmate who is an internist on long island . </s><s> `` he always said you should n't sit around whining about things , '' schwarz said . </s><s> `` he would say , `go after what 's yours and what 's right . '' ' </s><s> bart slepian 's determination surfaced in quirky ways . </s><s> he once insisted on going to the top of the world trade center , despite a crippling fear of heights . </s><s> to get to the window , he crawled , inch by inch . </s><s> `` i said , `you do n't have to do this , ' '' recalled schwarz , who was with him at the time . </s><s> `` and he said , `i want to do it . ' </s><s> bart made it count . </s><s> he felt alive . '' </s><s> forced to drop out of school every few semesters to work , he lived in reno with his sister serena , a widow who was struggling to take care of two young daughters . </s><s> she worked as a waitress and a blackjack dealer , sharing her tips with him while he drove a cab , cleaned barns at a ranch and worked as a laboratory assistant at the local veterans administration hospital . </s><s> after graduation , he moved to buffalo for his medical residency . </s><s> there he married lynne breitbart , a registered nurse 10 years his junior , and scraped together the money to buy an obstetrics practice from a doctor who was about to retire . </s><s> he had a soothing , unhurried manner . </s><s> when a patient of his , patti durlak , was diagnosed with diabetes , slepian referred her to a specialist but called every few days for months to help her overcome a fear of the needles she had to use for her insulin injections . </s><s> `` the other doctor said , `just deal with it , ' '' mrs. durlak recalled . </s><s> `` not dr . </s><s> slepian . '' </s><s> in most ways , he was a typical suburban family man , working six days a week and spending his free time at little league games and county fairs with his four sons . </s><s> but by the late 1980s , he and other abortion doctors in buffalo were under siege . </s><s> in one notorious 1991 incident recorded on videotape , the rev . </s><s> paul schenck , one of the fieriest of buffalo 's anti-abortion leaders , threw himself in front of the doctor 's car as he pulled into the clinic driveway . </s><s> slepian parked on the street . </s><s> as he pushed his way through the crowd of chanting demonstrators , schenck cupped his hands around his mouth and lunged , shouting , `` slepian , you pig ! '' </s><s> slepian 's attempts to separate the abortion conflict from his private life were futile . </s><s> the protests followed him home and the man who had been so bashful as a boy found himself , uncomfortably , at the center of controversy and attention . </s><s> once , he showed his anger . </s><s> in 1988 , when demonstrators jeered at him from the sidewalk in front of his home as he opened hanukkah presents with his children , the doctor came out brandishing a baseball bat . </s><s> he denied he hurt anyone , but a town judge ordered him to repair one protester 's smashed van window and pay a portion of another 's medical bills . </s><s> the outburst surprised his family and friends . </s><s> it was not slepian 's style to make a public fuss , much less acknowledge the stress of being taunted by protesters . </s><s> `` stress ? '' </s><s> his oldest brother paul responded gruffly when asked about the doctor 's mood . </s><s> `` i never heard the word used in my family , except as an engineering term . </s><s> he said it was a nuisance . '' </s><s> mrs. slepian did not respond to requests for an interview . </s><s> she expressed rage to the buffalo news shortly after the shooting . </s><s> she said that whoever had killed her husband deserved the death penalty and that she would be happy to administer the lethal injection herself . </s><s> she also spoke out after schenck 's brother , robert , another anti-abortion leader who frequently confronted slepian , sent a bouquet of flowers . </s><s> mrs. slepian denounced him as `` a hypocrite . '' </s><s> after the confrontation in 1988 , slepian turned to civil harassment lawsuits , letters and levity to deal with the protesters . </s><s> in 1993 , when a man active in the anti-abortion effort was arrested for rifling through the doctor 's garbage cans at home , slepian tried to treat the incident lightly . </s><s> `` they hopefully got the bags full of dirty diapers , '' he joked . </s><s> he tried to engage his critics through the local newspaper . </s><s> he told the buffalo news that abortion protesters should turn their energies to helping women avoid unwanted pregnancies through birth control and counseling . </s><s> in a letter to the editor he warned that by repeatedly calling him a murderer , his critics were inciting violence . </s><s> slepian accepted that opponents of abortion acted out of moral conviction , his friends said , but resented the personal attacks . </s><s> `` he thought it tended to demonize and dehumanize him and increased the danger , '' said his lawyer , glenn edward murray . </s><s> so slepian took a step that few of the nation 's beleaguered abortion clinic doctors dared . </s><s> he insisted that if he tried hard enough , he might cut through the venom . </s><s> to the dismay of the staff members who feared for his safety , slepian began about a year ago to stop and chat with protesters he recognized outside the womenservices abortion clinic in buffalo , where he worked two days a week . </s><s> he surprised a gathering of protesters who were preparing for what they euphemistically called a `` house call , '' or demonstration at the doctor 's home , and invited the protest 's organizer , the rev . </s><s> robert behn , to breakfast . </s><s> their hourlong conversation the next morning was inconclusive , behn said , dismissing slepian 's gesture as an `` attempt to get people to like him . '' </s><s> he asked slepian how performing abortions affected him spiritually . </s><s> in response , he recalled , the doctor said , `` i 'm fine spiritually . '' </s><s> slepian , meanwhile , focused more on time away from home with his family . </s><s> he planned to take a cruise next spring . </s><s> he bought a time-share apartment near disney world in florida . </s><s> `` he had so many plans , '' said ellen fink , a close friend of the couple for 15 years . </s><s> `` he was n't done . </s><s> he was n't done living yet . '' </s><s> still , sometimes during the most casual conversations , a shadow would appear . </s><s> when his wife gave him a gray african parrot for a birthday gift , slepian joked that the bird would probably outlive him so he would teach it his eulogy . </s><s> `` he would talk about the funeral he wanted , '' mrs. fink said . </s><s> `` he said he did n't have a lot of friends and wanted all of them to come in separate cars , one in each car , so he 'd have a long procession . '' </s><s> in the week before his death , slepian had reasons to be preoccupied with thoughts of mortality . </s><s> a medical checkup had revealed a blockage of his heart , mrs. fink said , recounting a conversation with mrs. slepian the day of the slaying . </s><s> a blockage is a sign of probable coronary artery disease . </s><s> he was to have more tests the following week . </s><s> `` i said , `lynne , just relax , it 's going to be ok , ' '' mrs. fink recalled . </s><s> that same day , the national abortion federation sent a fax to the womenservices clinic warning of a pattern of sniper attacks on abortion doctors that occurred in early november . </s><s> marilynne buckham , the clinic director , sent it to slepian . </s><s> `` he definitely took it seriously , '' she recalled . </s><s> typically , the doctor did not share any concerns he might have felt . </s><s> `` it was a normal day , '' said tammi latini , his office assistant . </s><s> `` we were horsing around . ' </s><s> that evening , the slepians went to synagogue to mark the ninth anniversary of the death of slepian 's father . </s><s> shortly after they returned home , a sniper 's bullet smashed through the kitchen window , killing slepian as he chatted with his wife and sons . </s><s> the protesters returned to the clinic five days later , the first day it reopened . </s><s> mrs. buckham , the director , said slepian would not have been surprised . </s><s> they have their routine . </s><s> `` he never wanted a day to end on a bad note , '' she said . </s><s> `` at the end of the day , i would always say , `thank you for coming . ' </s><s> and he would always turn with a stupid grin and say , `thanks for having me . '' '	slain doctor supported women 's right to abortion as a matter of principle	murdered abortion doctor a long time target of abortion protestors	slain abortion doctor ; unlikely martyr ; unassuming ; stubborn ; women 's care .	slepian , oct. 23 , sniper , obstetrics , abortion , schenck , murray , clinic

jammed with teen-age halloween revelers into a deathtrap , killing at least 60 people and injuring about 180 . </s><s> `` it reminded me of the gas chambers at auschwitz , '' local rescue service leader lennart olin said on national radio , describing the sight when rescuers first entered the building in goteborg , a city of half a million people on the country 's west coast . </s><s> the fire was the deadliest in modern swedish history since 1978 , when 20 people died in the town of boraas . </s><s> `` we are still searching the building ... but so far we have found 60 dead , '' goteborg police official jan edmundson said on national radio . </s><s> at a news conference friday morning , police said most victims choked to death on smoke and poisonous gases . </s><s> the injured toll was lowered slightly to 180 , but included seven people who needed treatment at emergency burn centers . </s><s> binan atta was walking to the macedonian association when he saw the fire . </s><s> he said he raced in and pulled to safety several people , including a friend . </s><s> `` his clothes had burned off . </s><s> his skin was red and bubbly , '' atta said . </s><s> `` lots of kids were just screaming , '' he added at hammarkullen lutheran church , where several dozen family and friends of victims gathered . </s><s> `` i saw about 10 people in windows who just jumped . </s><s> they did n't even look down '' beforehand . </s><s> fire officials were alerted at 11:43 p.m. ( 2243 gmt ) thursday and had a fire truck at the scene four minutes later , rescue workers said . </s><s> the blaze was already consuming the two-story brick building . </s><s> the dance was on the second floor . </s><s> about 300 or 400 people were inside , police said . </s><s> many escaped on their own . </s><s> police rescued 40 , and recovered 59 bodies . </s><s> the 60th victim died at a hospital . </s><s> `` it was a panic , '' goteborg police spokesman bengt staaf said , with youths trampling each other to get out , and other youths scuffling with police to get in and attempt to help friends . </s><s> the cause of the fire was not immediately known . </s><s> `` what we know is that there was an explosion , '' edmundson said . </s><s> olin said there were signs that the fire was set . </s><s> `` the fact that it spread so fast indicates that it was not a normal fire , '' he said . </s><s> the swedish news agency tt reported 190 people were taken to hospitals with injuries , and about 20 were in intensive care . </s><s> seven of the most severely injured were taken by helicopter to burn clinics in other cities , the report said . </s><s> goteborg is about 500 kilometers ( 300 miles ) southwest of the capital , stockholm . </s><s> the fire broke out about midnight ( 2300 gmt thursday ) in building of the local macedonian association , which organized the dance . </s><s> the crowd in the second story of the building contained mostly 13 to 18 year olds celebrating halloween and a holiday weekend . </s><s> `` a night full of expectation , happiness over extra leave from school and high spirits in anticipation of a weekend was brutally and suddenly changed into a tragedy of incomprehensible dimensions , '' the goteborg city council said in a statement . </s><s> `` goteborg is today a city in shock . '' </s><s> jamal fawz , 15 , told tt that he was out on the dance floor when the blaze started with about 400 people inside . </s><s> `` it looked like it started in the ceiling , and lamps and loudspeakers fell to the floor , '' he was quoted as saying . </s><s> `` it was chaos . </s><s> everybody was trying to get out and people trampled on each other on the way to the exit . </s><s> ... others kicked out the windows and jumped out . '' </s><s> ambulances were called in from several nearby communities . </s><s> the goteborg rescue services also brought city buses into service to help transport the injured . </s><s> olin said the rescue service inspected the building in april 1997 and `` fulfilled all possible demands as far as emergency exits and the possibility for fast evacuation . '' </s><s> anna-lisa saar , a social worker at oestra hospital , where many of the victims were taken , said identifying many of them was difficult . </s><s> `` maybe you have teen-agers yourself and know how they are ... </s><s> they maybe do n't have their own identification , but have that of a friend who is a year older . </s><s> girls do n't carry their identification on them , but in a bag and maybe that was n't lying with the body , '' she said , according to tt . </s><s> goteborg has about 435,000 people .	deadliest swedish fire ever kills 60 at teen-age halloween dance	fire turns crowded swedish dance hall into death trap , killing at least 60	fire kills 60 at dance hall in goteborg , sweden .  arson a possibility .	scores of teenagers killed in goteborg , sweden , dance hall fire ; arson ?

second large city	60 teenage halloween reveler kill fire swedish dance hall	fire kill 60 overcrowded swedish dance hall  victim mostly 1318	sixty teenager  mostly immigrant  kill sweden s bad fire  180 hurt	a fire turned a dance hall jammed with teen-age halloween revelers into a deathtrap , killing at least 60 people and injuring about 180 in sweden 's second-largest city . </s><s> the fast-spreading fire completely gutted the building and left rescuers facing a hideous scene that local rescue service leader lennart olin likened to a `` gas chamber . '' </s><s> although an estimated 400 people , most aged 13 to 18 , were at the dance on the building 's second floor , the facility had approval for a maximum capacity of 150 , said hans carlsson , the detective leading the disaster investigation . </s><s> the fire , at the facilities of the macedonian association local immigrant group , was the deadliest in modern swedish history . </s><s> in 1978 , 20 people died in a fire at a hotel in the town of boraas . </s><s> at a news conference friday morning , police said most victims choked to death on smoke and poisonous gases ; 59 bodies were found at the scene and the 60th victim died at a hospital , officials said . </s><s> the dance apparently was attended mostly by immigrants or children of immigrant . </s><s> police said the list of injured included somalis and people from current and former yugoslavia . </s><s> the macedonian association , which rents space in the building , had in turn rented the facility out to another person for the dance , carlsson said . </s><s> that person was not immdiately identified . </s><s> binan atta was walking to the macedonian association when he saw the fire . </s><s> he said he raced in and pulled to safety several people , including a friend . </s><s> `` his clothes had burned off . </s><s> his skin was red and bubbly , '' atta said . </s><s> `` lots of kids were just screaming , '' he added at hammarkullen lutheran church , where several dozen family and friends of victims gathered . </s><s> `` i saw about 10 people in windows who just jumped . </s><s> they did n't even look down '' beforehand . </s><s> fire officials were alerted at 11:43 p.m. ( 2243 gmt ) thursday and had a fire truck at the scene four minutes later , rescue workers said . </s><s> the blaze was already consuming the building . </s><s> the building had just two exits , one of which was blocked by fire , city police technician stephen holmberg was quoted as saying by the swedish news agency tt . </s><s> `` it was a panic , '' goteborg police spokesman bengt staaf said , with youths trampling each other to get out , and other youths scuffling with police to get in and attempt to help friends . </s><s> the cause of the fire was not immediately known , although officials said it apparently began with an explosion . </s><s> olin said there were indications that the fire could have been set . </s><s> `` the fact that it spread so fast indicates that it was not a normal fire , '' he said . </s><s> about 180 people were taken to hospitals with injuries , and about 20 were in intensive care . </s><s> seven of the most severely injured were taken by helicopter to burn clinics in other cities . </s><s> goteborg is about 500 kilometers ( 300 miles ) southwest of the capital , stockholm . </s><s> the crowd in the second story of the building contained mostly 13 to 18 year olds celebrating halloween and a holiday weekend . </s><s> `` a night full of expectation , happiness over extra leave from school and high spirits in anticipation of a weekend was brutally and suddenly changed into a tragedy of incomprehensible dimensions , '' the goteborg city council said in a statement . </s><s> `` goteborg is today a city in shock . '' </s><s> prime minister goeran persson visited the fire site at midday and king carl xvi gustav made a statement of condolence . </s><s> jamal fawz , 15 , told tt that he was out on the dance floor when the blaze started with about 400 people inside . </s><s> `` it looked like it started in the ceiling , and lamps and loudspeakers fell to the floor , '' he was quoted as saying . </s><s> `` it was chaos . </s><s> everybody was trying to get out and people trampled on each other on the way to the exit . </s><s> ... others kicked out the windows and jumped out . '' </s><s> ambulances were called in from several nearby communities . </s><s> the goteborg rescue services also brought city buses into service to help transport the injured . </s><s> anna-lisa saar , a social worker at oestra hospital , where many of the victims were taken , said identifying many of them was difficult . </s><s> `` maybe you have teen-agers yourself and know how they are ... </s><s> they maybe do n't have their own identification , but have that of a friend who is a year older . </s><s> girls do n't carry their identification on them , but in a bag and maybe that was n't lying with the body , '' she said , according to tt . </s><s> goteborg has about 435,000 people .	at least 60 killed at dancehall fire in sweden 's second largest city	some 60 teenage halloween revelers killed by fire in swedish dance hall	fire kills 60 at overcrowded swedish dance hall .  victims mostly 13-18 .	sixty teenagers , mostly immigrants , killed in sweden 's worst fire ; 180 hurt

fire	emergency service burn dancehall delay language difficulty	phone call poor swedish delay fire squad  response dance hall fire	alarm call poor swedish hard understand  explosive fire	response swedish fire slow accent  cause unknown  memorial growing	a panicky telephone call in poor swedish was the first word that authorities got of a fire racing through a dance hall crowded with immigrant teen-agers , delaying fire squads ' response to the blaze that killed 60 and injured 162 , officials said saturday . </s><s> per-olof ortarsen of goteborg 's emergency services line said the call was so hard to understand that it took three minutes for workers to figure out what was going on and where to send fire trucks . </s><s> the first fire trucks and rescue squads were on the scene six minutes after the call was received , ortarsen said at a news conference . </s><s> he and other officials declined to comment on whether a quicker response could have saved any of the mostly immigrant victims . </s><s> the minutes of delay felt endless to those caught in the terror of the fire and survivors have spoken angrily of what they saw as a slow and even obstructive response . </s><s> ''no help . </s><s> no police . </s><s> no firemen , '' 17-year-old zuhir hersi , one of the disc jockeys at the bash , said friday , hours after the blaze exploded . </s><s> ''just kids helping kids . '' </s><s> and once the squads arrived , the kids were blocked from helping , they say . </s><s> ''we could have saved more young people if only police had n't stopped us , '' mohanned hussein was quoted as saying by the newspaper expressen . </s><s> on saturday , hundreds of people stood quietly outside the gutted building amid flowers and candles as they attempted to come to grips with catastrophe . </s><s> in the parking lot that a day before had been a tumult of ambulances and screams , mourners had laid a 30-meter-long ( 100-foot-long ) pile of bouquets , candles and cards of remembrance . </s><s> the cards ' inscriptions were brief _ `` i will see you in heaven , '' `` we miss you '' _ and the people who stood reading them also had few words . </s><s> `` i just wanted to show my sympathy . </s><s> i think about them . </s><s> there 's nothing else we can do , '' said caroline ericsson , who did n't know any of the victims . </s><s> for lasse gustavsson , having the right words was n't as important as showing his face , severely disfigured in a fire . </s><s> the former goteborg firefighter lost his ears , his eyelids and most of his nose in a gas explosion . </s><s> by showing up , he said , he wanted to show the victims ' relatives and friends that spirit can help them pull through despair . </s><s> `` i ca n't give them hope . </s><s> consolation is enough , '' he said , as people nearby cast uneasy glances at his scars . </s><s> many of those injured in the blaze may have to endure similar shocked looks the rest of their lives . </s><s> authorities say the explosive fire quickly raised the temperature in the overcrowded hall to 600 degrees ( 1,100 f ) . </s><s> the cause of the fire that broke out just before midnight thursday remains under investigation . </s><s> witness accounts have varied widely , with some reporting smoke coming from the cellar and others saying the fire appeared to start in the ceiling of the dance hall on the building 's second floor . </s><s> the fire 's quick spread has prompted speculation that it could have been set , but officials also say the explosive spread could have been because the fire had been burning undetected for some time . </s><s> what 's known is that the hall was packed far beyond its capacity . </s><s> licensed to hold a maximum of 150 , the hall held at least 250 and perhaps as many as 400 when the fire hit . </s><s> the crowd was mostly teen-agers and mostly immigrants or children of immigrant parents . </s><s> they had come for a dance organized by eight party-arrangers whom police have not identified ; the hall was rented by the organizers from the local macedonian immigrant association . </s><s> officials said the dead and injured were of 19 nationalities , including somalis , ethiopians , iraqis , iranians and swedes , as well as people from the current and former yugoslavia and unspecified latin american countries . </s><s> identifying the dead was a wrackingly slow process , forcing relatives and friends already exhausted with dread to wait for hours at hospitals . </s><s> only 18 of the dead had been identified by midday saturday . </s><s> `` the identification is hard because they have no driver 's licenses or other documents _ they were so young , '' said kerstin einarsson of sahlgrenska hospital , the largest in the city of 435,000 residents about 300 miles ( 500 kilometers ) west of stockholm . </s><s> the worst previous swedish fire disaster in modern history was in 1978 in boraas , when 20 people died in a hotel fire .	emergency services to burning dancehall delayed by language difficulties	phone call in poor swedish delayed fire squads ' response to dance hall fire	alarm call in poor swedish hard to understand . strong sign that this city is going bonkers for the padres came friday morning when 680 fans agreed to shave their heads for a radio promotion raffle in return for a 1-in-680 chance at skybox tickets for post-season play . </s><s> `` this was more a show of support for the team than it was for the one ticket , '' said tommy sablan , producer of the `` jeff and jer '' show . </s><s> `` it was symbolic of the efforts of the bald padres _ tony gwynn , wally joyner , greg vaughn , jim leyritz . </s><s> about a thousand people showed up _ men , women and children . </s><s> we had 10 barbers and 20 hairdressers and it took six hours for the lines to either get buzzed or straight-razored . </s><s> `` we were shocked at the turnout . </s><s> but this is a bandwagon town . </s><s> `buy the ticket on the day of the concert ' type public . </s><s> you 'll see an even bigger bandwagon on monday when they 've won and then hopefully we play the yankees and it 's a real world series . '' </s><s> after the padres beat the braves , 3-0 , in game 2 of the national league championship series on thursday night in atlanta to take a two-game lead in the four-of-seven-game series , san diego fans began gearing up for a shot at the world series in more traditional ways . </s><s> it would be the team 's first world series appearance since 1984 , and in the downtown business district friday , marquees and banners read `` go padres '' and a lunch-hour rally was attended by several hundred fans . </s><s> the padres set an attendance record of 2,555,901 this season , up a half-million from last year and nearly a million and a half from three years ago . </s><s> it stemmed in part from an effort by john moores , the padres owner , and larry lucchino , the team 's president , to put family entertainment in the park after they bought the team in december 1994 . </s><s> `` this is a more diversified group of fans than i saw in atlanta , '' lucchino said . </s><s> `` their crowd seemed yuppified . </s><s> we 're proud of our three generations of families who come to the games . '' </s><s> donna mcmahon , a 63-year-old homemaker from la jolla , has been a fan since she was 10 and the pacific coast league padres played at lane field near the harbor . </s><s> she would take a streetcar after school to meet her father , and he would buy bleacher seats . </s><s> later , she brought her four children to jack murphy stadium for the national league padres when 2,500 people was a crowd . </s><s> now , she brings her grandchildren to a sold-out qualcomm stadium . </s><s> `` there are different groups in the stands , '' she said , `` the upper class , the middle class , the business person , the beer-drinking fan , the children , all of the mexican fans from across the border . </s><s> we are true fans _ all of us . '' </s><s> san diego mayor susan golding agrees , while also giving credit to the balmy weather . </s><s> `` padre fans are a cross-section from all over the county , '' she said . </s><s> `` downtown , suburban , rural , east , north , ranchers and farmers to high-tech engineers , yuppies to the new kids _ the x generation . </s><s> a lot from across the border . </s><s> the padres are extremely popular in tijuana . </s><s> we do have the perfect weather for a long baseball season . </s><s> playing in the world series in october has got to be better than in new york . '' </s><s> carlos carrion , who was born in san diego and has been a baseball fan for 25 years , brings his 10- and 8-year-old sons to the stadium . </s><s> `` this is a great chance to let my children see the players work , '' carrion said . </s><s> `` they can look up to these guys and understand their character and their work ethic . '' </s><s> the padres ticket office estimates that on average , more than 15,000 fans in the 65,000-seat stadium are latin americans from san diego , baja california or the state of sonora . </s><s> the padres have the first major league baseball souvenir store in tijuana .	fans bonkers for padres , 650 have heads shaved in radio promotion raffle	excited fans shave their heads for padres play-off series ticket raffle	san diego fans , wide demographic mix , excited about padres in world series .	world series , qualcomm stadium , bald padres , 10 barbers , diversified

2  indian	the moment of truth for chuck knoblauch came in the bottom of the first inning when his name was announced at yankee stadium for the first time since he neglected to chase down that memorable loose ball last wednesday . </s><s> there were no boos . </s><s> it was a very warm ovation . </s><s> they liked him . </s><s> they really liked him . </s><s> knoblauch exhaled . </s><s> knoblauch had emphasized before the game that he was concerned about winning and rumbling into the world series , not about the fans . </s><s> but it surely made knoblauch feel at home when he realized that the fans had forgiven him . </s><s> victories , more than time , had healed the malice toward knoblauch and he could play second base without earplugs . </s><s> when the yankees defeated the indians , 9-5 , in game 6 on tuesday night to advance to their second world series in three years , knoblauch was easily the most relieved player on the field . </s><s> the awful mistake that he had made in game 2 would be forgotten . </s><s> the yankees had won the pennant , and knoblauch was celebrating as much as anyone . </s><s> `` to have them act like that toward me was tremendous , '' said knoblauch , about the response that he received . </s><s> `` it was a great feeling , and it really helped me out . '' </s><s> knoblauch was wearing a cap that declared the yankees champions of the american league in 1998 ; champagne dripped off the brim as he spoke . </s><s> he did not look up , but continued to talk about how he had learned a lot by being vilified after making a mistake that little leaguers are expected not to make . </s><s> `` just to face things and take it like a man and answer all the questions , although they 're tough , '' knoblauch said . </s><s> `` you see what you 're made of when you have to bounce back from something like that . </s><s> that 's basically what i learned . '' </s><s> if the yankees had lost the alcs , even some of knoblauch 's teammates had said that he would be branded as the villain for failing to pursue the ball that glanced off travis fryman 's back while he was running outside the baseline . </s><s> knoblauch had argued with the umpire while the go ahead run scored from first and the indians won , 4-1 . </s><s> now knoblauch can watch television and read the newspapers again without getting queasy . </s><s> `` that 's huge for him , '' david cone said . </s><s> `` that 's huge for me . </s><s> i let them back into the game , and that would have been a tough one if they would have come back and beat us . </s><s> and knobbie , i 'm sure he 's feeling a lot better now . '' </s><s> knoblauch , who had two hits in five at-bats , was working on his second bottle of champagne five minutes after reporters were allowed into the clubhouse . </s><s> he flashed the sort of smile that he had not shown too much recently and , now that the yankees are in the world series , knoblauch should expect to be teased often about his mistake . </s><s> `` maybe if we go all the way , we 'll do that , '' derek jeter said . </s><s> `` i do n't know what i 'll say , but i 'll think of something good . ''	yankee 's knoblauch receives ovation despite errors in previous games	fans forgive knoblauch for error after yankees take american league title	yankee fans forgive knoblauch error after american league championship win	knoblauch , boos , yankees , world series , alcs , fryman , game 2 , indians

teammate world series	strawberry  cancer  outfielder  world series  chemotherapy  number 39	hours after darryl strawberry was released from columbia presbyterian medical center friday , he spoke happily about being able to play with his two young children , joked about eating a small amount of chicken and potatoes and sounded relieved to be at home in fort lee , n.j. , instead of in a hospital . </s><s> `` i 'm really feeling good , '' said strawberry , in a telephone interview . </s><s> `` it 's nice to be home with the kids and to just kick back . </s><s> that 's all that i 'm going to do . </s><s> this feels good . '' </s><s> strawberry , who underwent surgery to remove a cancer from his colon on oct. 3 , said he will remain in new jersey for another 10 or 12 days before returning home to rancho mirage , calif . </s><s> the 36-year old outfielder , who lost a significant amount of weight from his 215-pound frame , said he does not have enough strength to attend any of the world series games and is content watching his teammates play the padres on television . </s><s> `` my heart is with them , '' said strawberry , who spoke to several yankees after they won the american league championship . </s><s> `` i 'm just going to relax at home and watch the game . </s><s> i 'm looking forward to it . </s><s> i may not be there , but it 'll feel like i am . '' </s><s> paul o'neill echoed the sentiments of many yankees by saying , `` everything we 're going through is game . </s><s> this is his life . </s><s> any time we get some good news about darryl it 's uplifting . </s><s> we 're all praying for him . '' </s><s> since cancerous cells were found in one of the 36 lymph nodes removed from his abdomen during the operation , strawberry said doctors told him he will need six months of chemotherapy treatment once he returns to california . </s><s> the 36-year-old outfielder said doctors told him he will need one treatment of at least one hour a week . </s><s> `` i was never scared , '' said strawberry . </s><s> `` i was more emotional than anything . </s><s> at the time of it , i had played for a while with this . </s><s> i wanted to keep playing because i knew we were going to get into the world series . '' </s><s> at that point , strawberry stopped and laughed , probably because the yankees had made it to the world series as he expected . </s><s> `` i wanted to be there because that 's what you play for , '' said strawberry . </s><s> `` i do n't think that i was ever scared . </s><s> it 's something that i wanted to deal with head on . </s><s> i talked to eric davis about the chemo . </s><s> he said it 's not as bad as some people say . '' </s><s> although the discovery of cancer in one lymph node proved that the cancer had spread , strawberry remained optimistic about his future and said , `` it did n't worry me . </s><s> i got all the information from the doctors . </s><s> one out of 36 is good . </s><s> it was n't spreading . </s><s> it did n't run off and get crazy like cancer can . '' </s><s> when strawberry was released from the hospital in a wheelchair friday , a few hundred fans who had congregated chanted , `` darryl , darryl . '' </s><s> strawberry , who struggled not to cry , hugged a few nurses , thanked everyone for supporting him , then rose from the wheelchair and carefully entered a car . </s><s> `` wow , i never thought this day would come , '' strawberry said . </s><s> unlike david wells , saturday night 's starter in the world series who predicted the yankees would throttle the padres in five games , strawberry refused to make a prediction about whether he will soon be getting his third world series ring . </s><s> but strawberry , who is still hopeful about returning to play in 1999 , sounded very confident in the 1998 yankees , who are wearing his number 39 on the back of their caps as inspiration . </s><s> `` they look really good , '' said strawberry . '' </s><s> it 's not going to be easy , but i think they 're ready . </s><s> the best thing about making it to the world series is you know you do n't have to go anywhere else after that . </s><s> you 've made it to that point and then you go do the best you can do . </s><s> that 's what it 's all about . ''	darryl strawberry , recovering from colon cancer surgery , passes on series	darryl strawberry released from hospital after successful cancer surgery	after cancer surgery darryl strawberry to watch teammates in world series	strawberry , cancer , outfielder , world series , chemotherapy , number 39
