may give yankee edge padre series	assessment yankee  pitching  baserunning  padre  hitting  pitch advice	yankee  pitch  defense  padre  hit  offense  alcs  indian	yankees pitching the starting pitching enabled the yankees to advance past cleveland in the american league championship series . </s><s> david wells is 7-1 in his career in the postseason and he should have an additional edge against a padres ' lineup that is generally less effective against left-handed pitching . </s><s> orlando hernandez has four terrific pitches , pitched seven shutout innings in the pivotal game 4 of the alcs and earned the start in game 2 of this series . </s><s> david cone should benefit from six days ' worth of rest when he starts game 3 , as well as being able to pitch in warm southern california . </s><s> mariano rivera 's stuff might be as good as it has been all year , and mike stanton continues to be a dominant postseason pitcher . </s><s> reasons for concern : the erratic andy pettitte , who needs a home-plate umpire to call strikes on pitches low and away , and jeff nelson , who lost his command in his last brief outing . </s><s> offense there were signs in the alcs that the offense is coming out of its collective slump _ chuck knoblauch is getting on base consistently , derek jeter is back to driving the ball to right field and through the middle , bernie williams had three hits in game 6 , and scott brosius has been a consistent force at the bottom of the lineup . </s><s> but the yankees do have holes : chili davis will be hard-pressed to catch up to the fastballs of kevin brown and andy ashby , and tino martinez 's postseason funk is a problem . </s><s> the yankees could use a contribution from jorge posada , who will start in games 1 and 2 and may get a chance to drive pitches low in the strike zone , where he can hit with power . </s><s> defense the yankees have the best defense in baseball , excellent up the middle with jeter and knoblauch , and at third with brosius . </s><s> nobody 's really taken advantage of the fact that williams has a poor arm in center field , but rest assured that ken caminiti , steve finley and greg vaughn will try . </s><s> the indians did expose the fact that the yankees ' pitchers have trouble preventing baserunners from stealing from second to third base . </s><s> baserunning the yankees run well as they take extra bases , particularly paul o'neill , brosius , jeter and knoblauch going first-to-third ; williams can make mistakes . </s><s> the yankees probably wo n't be able to steal against kevin brown , who has an effective slide step , but they could be aggressive against andy ashby , or the combination of sterling hitchcock and jim leyritz . </s><s> padres hitting except for jim leyritz , no one in the san diego lineup is particularly hot or particularly frightening at the moment . </s><s> tony gwynn has n't been as consistent as he usually is , ken caminiti and greg vaughn have been streaky . </s><s> but the padres are a veteran team capable of putting the ball in play , getting runners on base and then moving them along , and so long as they are getting exceptional pitching , that 's all they really need . </s><s> quilvio veras , the leadoff hitter , is adept at drawing walks and steve finley , who has become more pull conscious in the last two years , could try to take aim at the right field stands in yankee stadium . </s><s> vaughn 's power could be a factor if the yankees ' pitchers do n't jam him enough to keep him from leaning over the plate . </s><s> pitching kevin brown is the best pitcher in this series , capable of winning three games if necessary , should padres manager bruce bochy choose to start him in games 1 , 4 and 7 . </s><s> but at some point , san diego will need a big outing from either andy ashby or sterling hitchcock . </s><s> when ashby 's right , he 's hitting the corners with his sinking fastball and his slider , and when his command is suspect , he gets pounded . </s><s> hitchcock used his split-fingered fastball to great effectiveness against right-handed batters in the first two rounds of the playoffs , but the yankees ' left-handed hitters may cause him some concern . </s><s> san diego 's middle relief is the weakest aspect of the team , with randy myers and mark langston from the left side ( the stuff of each has waned ) . </s><s> but if a lead can be delivered into the hands of closer trevor hoffman , he 'll keep it . </s><s> defense they mostly catch the ball and avoid mistakes , though they are unspectacular . </s><s> shortstop chris gomez and the second baseman veras are adept at turning double plays , and caminiti won a gold glove at third base last year ; wally joyner has good hands at first ; the center fielder steve finley is extremely quick in tracking down base hits and returning the ball to the infield . </s><s> tony gwynn 's range is better toward the right field line , not nearly as good on balls hit in the gaps . </s><s> the yankees will be able to run on the arm of vaughn in left field . </s><s> baserunning veras can steal bases ( 24 ) this year , and finley can in a tight spot , as well . </s><s> in general , however , the padres are a slow , plodding team , though caminiti and vaughn are good at going first-to-third , and gwynn wo n't make mistakes on the bases . </s><s> pitching to the padres quilvio veras : a switch-hitter who has more power right-handed ; should try to pitch him down-and-in with breaking balls when he 's hitting right-handed , jam him with fastballs when he 's batting left-handed . </s><s> steve finley : a left-handed hitter who likes to pull the ball . </s><s> left-handers like david wells can beat him with breaking balls low and outside . </s><s> tony gwynn : when he 's hot , he 's impossible . </s><s> when he 's not hitting well , he can be anxious early in the count , and he should be fed breaking balls out of the strike zone . </s><s> greg vaughn : big-time power on anything high and over the plate . </s><s> because he likes to pull the ball , you must pitch him on the outer edge , occasionally jamming him to keep him honest . </s><s> ken caminiti : more power right-handed , a better hitter left-handed . </s><s> these days , he 's a good lowball hitter and can be beat by fastballs up in the zone . </s><s> wally joyner : with runners on base , he 'll try to jump on a fastball early in the count . </s><s> is not a strong hitter and can be jammed . </s><s> chris gomez : like derek jeter , likes to hit pitches inside out , to right field and through the middle . </s><s> he can hit with power if you make a mistake with a breaking ball . </s><s> ruben rivera : an impatient hitter who will chase pitches out of the strike zone . </s><s> carlos hernandez : looks for the first-pitch fastball in the upper half of the strike zone . </s><s> can struggle against breaking balls . </s><s> jim leyritz : no apparent holes right now , can hit fastballs in and away . </s><s> best bet is to get ahead in the count and try to get him to chase breaking balls . </s><s> pitching to the yankees chuck knoblauch : hard throwers like to jam him with fastballs because he stands on top of the plate , which is why he gets hit so often . </s><s> derek jeter : sometimes he has a tendency to chase pitches at his feet , but if you do n't get the ball in far enough , he can hammer the ball over the wall in right . </s><s> paul o'neill : the yankees ' best pure hitter , he sometimes will chase fastballs up and away , particularly after there is one strike . </s><s> bernie williams : a switch-hitter who has trouble resisting chest-high fastballs . </s><s> when he lays off them , he is a much better hitter , and he did this in the last game of the cleveland series . </s><s> chili davis : has a great eye and will work a pitcher deep into a count , but he can be overpowered with fastballs above his belt . </s><s> cheats some now to get his bat started , making him vulnerable to off-speed pitches . </s><s> tino martinez : nothing seems right at the moment . </s><s> is anxious and chases pitches out of the strike zone when he falls behind in the count , and is n't taking advantage of mistakes when they 're made . </s><s> scott brosius : a great breaking ball hitter , but he can also drive a fastball a long way when he anticipates , as cleveland 's charles nagy now knows . </s><s> jorge posada : when batting left-handed , he fares very poorly against splitters , curveballs and sliders . </s><s> ricky ledee : like all young hitters , he has a tendency to expand the strike zone and chase pitches out of the strike zone after falling behind in the count . </s><s> kevin brown likely will attack him aggressively . </s><s> saturday 's pitchers kevin brown : best sinking fastball in the game ( 91-93 ) mph , a four-seam fastball of 95-97 mph to throw high in the strike zone , a slider that breaks down and away from right-handed batters , and a forkball that dives at 88-89 mph . </s><s> holds runners well . </s><s> david wells : aggressive , aggressive , aggressive , challenging hitters with fastballs . </s><s> his curveball can be exceptional , and his changeup has improved . </s><s> throw strikes : allowed as many home runs ( 29 ) as walks ( 29 ) , but has not allowed a three-run homer or a grand slam all year .	yankees set pitching staff lineup for first three games of world series	pitching and defense may give yankees edge against padres in series	assessment of yankees ' world series first rate past show fallible	umpire imperfect  get way game  make wrong decision	umpire  league playoff  world series  indian  hargrove  brinkman  hendry	the last time they were seen on the field at yankee stadium , they were inadvertently influencing the outcome of the game that sent the cleveland indians home and the yankees to the world series . </s><s> that 's not to say the umpires will mess up in the world series , but they have shown they are eminently capable of interfering with the natural progression of postseason games . </s><s> all right , so ted hendry wo n't be in the world series ; the umpires ' collective bargaining agreement with the leagues does not allow an umpire to work both a league championship series and the world series . </s><s> joe brinkman wo n't be here either , even though the agreement does allow for an umpire to work both a division series and the world series . </s><s> the three american league umpires who are on the six-man world series crew did work in the first round of the playoffs . </s><s> one of them , richie garcia , will be the crew chief and behind the plate in saturday night 's opener at yankee stadium . </s><s> gene budig , the al president , friday called garcia , a 24-year veteran , one of the league 's `` most respected umpires . '' </s><s> but after saturday night , garcia will move to right field sunday night for game 2 . </s><s> now why does that combination sound familiar , richie garcia and right field ? </s><s> ah yes , the last time garcia worked a post-season series at yankee stadium , he was the umpire in game 1 of the league championship series two years ago when a young fan from new jersey _ no name , please ; he has been over-glorified enough _ reached over the fence and caught derek jeter 's fly ball just as tony tarasco , baltimore 's right fielder , prepared to catch it . </s><s> garcia ruled no interference , that it was a home run , then said oops after watching a television replay clearly showing interference . </s><s> too late . </s><s> the call helped the yankees win the first game and set the tone for the series . </s><s> `` even though he made a mistake , you know you have the best out there , '' a baseball official , speaking on the condition of anonymity , said . </s><s> that knowledge comes as small consolation to the orioles . </s><s> budig , too , acknowledged that umpires , like players and managers , are n't perfect . </s><s> `` major league umpires are skilled at what they do , but they are human , '' he said in a telephone interview . </s><s> `` day in and day out they do a very good job for major league baseball . </s><s> rounds one and two have been difficult , but that happens from time to time . '' </s><s> the umpires were so human in the american league playoffs that it happened from time to time to time to time . </s><s> the cleveland indians suffered the brunt of the fallibility of the umpires . </s><s> `` we had a highlight reel of umpires getting knocked down by baseballs , '' general manager john hart said after the indians ' final game against the yankees . </s><s> `` the umpires did n't lose the game for us , but we had our share of controversies in two playoff series with umpires . '' </s><s> in the division series against boston , brinkman , the plate umpire , was so bad with his calls on pitches and plays at the plate that he immediately provoked disputes that led to his ejecting of mike hargrove , the indians ' manager , three pitches into game 2 , and dwight gooden , their starting pitcher , 19 pitches later . </s><s> hendry was right or wrong , depending on one 's point of view , for his noncall of interference on travis fryman in the 12th inning of game 2 of the alcs . </s><s> that ruling went in favor of the indians . </s><s> little else did . </s><s> in game 4 , jeter was stealing second in the fifth inning when the on-target throw from sandy alomar jr. hit jim mckean , who jumped to try to get out of the way but instead kicked the ball into right field . </s><s> a batted ball , omar vizquel 's line drive , struck hendry in game 6 . </s><s> but the worst call of game 6 was hendry 's on a force play at second base . </s><s> hendry called bernie williams safe , ruling that vizquel 's foot came off the base before he caught the ball . </s><s> members of the yankees indicated friday that they , too , thought the call was wrong . </s><s> `` i do n't know , '' williams said when asked what he thought , `` but i 'll take it . </s><s> it was a big play . '' </s><s> but did he think he was out ? </s><s> `` i 'd rather not comment about that , '' he said . </s><s> `` it will stir a lot of controversy . </s><s> i do n't want to get into that . '' </s><s> when a player believes he was safe , he says so and does n't worry about any subsequent controversy . </s><s> if williams was implying that he thought he was out , another member of the yankees said he had no doubt that williams was out . </s><s> `` i was n't sure at first , '' this uniformed member of the team said , `` but when i saw it was hendry , i said uh-oh . </s><s> i also thought omar is so smooth you 'd think he would n't come off the bag . </s><s> then i saw the replay . </s><s> the game today is faster than it used to be , this observer said . </s><s> the umpires have to be sharper . </s><s> maybe garcia , dale scott and tim tschida from the american league , and jerry crawford , dana demuth and mark hirschbeck from the national league , will be as sharp as an 18th century french guillotine in these four to seven games . </s><s> leonard coleman , the nl president , said he thought his umpires were first-rate in the division and league series and added that he has `` three splendid umpires '' working the world series . </s><s> budig said : `` the world series crew is proven and first-rate . </s><s> we have total confidence in them . series	postseason gain importance 2layered playoffs  league championship	torre  world series  threetiered playoff season  football  padre	talk about high expectations . </s><s> it 's not just the man from tampa who has them anymore . </s><s> knowing their baseball as well as they do , everybody in the joe torre family passed up tickets for the divisional series and the league championship series as just so much parsley on the plate of life . </s><s> `` the pressure was on to get to the world series , so i can see all those people , '' torre , the yankees ' manager , was saying before new york went out to play the here-we-are , let's-go-for-it san diego padres in the stadium saturday night . </s><s> now that the yankees are in the series , their florida-based owner and their fans and they themselves can see nothing more appropriate than four more victories . </s><s> anything less than 125 would feel like emptiness . </s><s> but why should the yankees be any different from the six teams that already fell off the bus to this world series ? </s><s> the gloom and doom in the six other cities will not compare to the letdown that would grip new york and the owner 's insatiable little heart should the yanks come up short . </s><s> the three-tiered playoff system has practically turned baseball into football , where the survival-of-the-fittest mentality produces one exalted super bowl champion and a league full of chumps and losers , condemned to a nether world of parcells-like demons kicking them in their sore spots for eternity . </s><s> the world series used to be a short and sweet reward for excellence , but that was when there were eight teams per league , and the winners met in daylight in early october . </s><s> even if the yankees clubbed my poor brooklyn dodgers into submission once again , well , there was always next year . </s><s> but in 1969 , baseball began league championship series , and in 1995 it began a two-layered playoff system . </s><s> the world series is still different , which is why we should all resist the babble of `` post-season records '' flung at us by the hyperactive computers and the hyperactive broadcasters from the dozens of different networks that carry baseball . </s><s> the world series is still a competition between one league that encourages pitchers to be athletes and another league relatively devoid of strategy . </s><s> somehow the `` playoffs '' leave just about everybody feeling inadequate . </s><s> think about it . </s><s> the houston astros are going around feeling they can not perform in the post-season . </s><s> the texas rangers are sulking because they had the best hitting in the league and could hardly touch yankee pitching when it counted . </s><s> in chicago , the glory of winning a special playoff for the wild-card spot and sammy sosa 's 66 home runs has been pre-empted . </s><s> the very city that beat the cubs for the 1969 eastern title held a parade for sosa saturday in the canyons where lindbergh and john glenn and the 1969 mets were once hailed . </s><s> speaking of indignity , there are the red sox , whose occasional qualification for the playoffs is merely a signal that nothing good can come of it . </s><s> in atlanta , the team of the '90s has won exactly one world series , and now it is up to management to keep repeating that : `` the main goal is to get to the series . </s><s> this is a recorded announcement . </s><s> this is a recorded announcement . </s><s> this is a recorded announcement . '' </s><s> in cleveland , the fans had to live with the phrase `` nineteen forty-eight ! '' </s><s> being chanted at the indians in the bronx as the yankees put the indians out of misery . </s><s> that leaves the padres as the only team with virtually nothing to lose . </s><s> this can be good , or it can be bad . </s><s> bruce bochy , the manager , a reserve on the 1984 san diego world series team , has said : `` a lot of the players on that team said , looking back , we wish we would have had a little different attitude instead of just saying , `hey , we are in the world series . ' </s><s> and this year , i think you will see the players out there playing to win . '' </s><s> torre recalled being the underdog in 1996 , but he said his yankees felt they could beat the braves . </s><s> `` i am sure that is the way the padres feel right now , that maybe other people are n't predicting a lot for them , but i am sure they are for themselves , '' torre said . </s><s> `` i think getting here is where the pressure is , '' torre added . </s><s> `` you want to win , but getting to the world series is so tough after playing 162 games and getting into post-season and then having to fight , bite and scratch and everything else to get here . '' </s><s> torre continued : `` you do n't think about in spring training that we want to go and win the world series . </s><s> you want to get to the world series . </s><s> then you get there , well , you have played well enough and won enough games , then of course , we want to win . </s><s> `` as far as legitimizing our season _ i hate to even think in negative terms , but if san diego happens to win the world series , sure it takes a little bit of the luster off what we have accomplished by getting here , but i think that was our goal , initially . '' </s><s> the key word in that sentence is `` initially . '' </s><s> the yankees built an insatiable demand for more victories _ and world series tickets in the torre family . </s><s> while they 're at it , the yankees had better win the whole thing . </s><s> they are a victim of their own excellence .	owner joe torre and family have high expectations for yankees in series	yankees ' excellence compels supporters to expect victory in world series	post-season gains importance with 2-layered play-offs , league championships	torre , world series , three-tiered playoff season , football , padres

season	martinez  yankee  padre  5 30  10 strikeout  drought postseason	a new shipment of bats arrived for tino martinez on friday , and he massaged the handles to make sure they were thin enough , knocked on the barrels and listened for a certain sound and swung them slowly again and again . </s><s> martinez was so excited about the fresh bats , he reacted like a little leaguer who was wielding an aluminum bat for the first time . </s><s> `` you were saving the world series trees until now , right ? '' </s><s> martinez said to the representative from the bat company . </s><s> `` these are from world series trees , are n't they ? '' </s><s> martinez could joke about the bats being specially designed for the world series because the yankees began their quest for a second title in the past three years when they play host to the san diego padres in game 1 at yankee stadium saturday night . </s><s> major leaguer players who were watching on television could not imitate david letterman and joke about world series wood . </s><s> even though martinez has struggled with numerous bats during the post-season , he could joke because the yankees are still alive for the title . </s><s> martinez is still alive . </s><s> for now , martinez , the power hitter who has mostly been missing in action , could joke around . </s><s> `` you always get a fresh start in the post-season because it 's game to game , '' said martinez . </s><s> `` if you win , you 've got another game the next day so you forget about the bad at-bats . </s><s> it 's easier to do that in post-season because your next at-bat could be the biggest at-bat of the season . '' </s><s> normally , having martinez at the plate for the biggest at-bat of the season would be a pleasing sight to the yankees . </s><s> but not when the calendar flips to october . </s><s> martinez has experienced another frustrating post-season . </s><s> he is 5 for 30 with 10 strikeouts , no homers and only 1 run batted in for a hitting-starved team that has batted .229 while still winning 7 of 9 post-season games because of superior pitching . </s><s> can the yankees continue to win if martinez , their most valuable run producer , is a sometime singles hitter ? </s><s> `` we 've just gotten through two good series , '' said paul o'neill . </s><s> `` the yankees won those series . </s><s> you do n't focus on one guy . </s><s> you focus on winning . </s><s> the whole team won . '' </s><s> as much as joe torre talked about martinez needing one line-drive hit to get him in a groove , the 30-year-old first baseman is in a career drought in the post-season . </s><s> since joining the yankees , martinez is 20 for 107 ( .187 ) with one homer and 4 rbi in 29 post-season games . </s><s> those are puny statistics , especially for a player who has driven in 381 runs in 455 regular season games over the last three years . </s><s> `` i would guess that tino would have a great series , '' o'neill said . </s><s> `` baseball has a way of evening things out . </s><s> you have a bad series , you come back and have a great series . </s><s> in the season , that 's easier to do . </s><s> in the post-season , it gets tougher . '' </s><s> it can not get much tougher for martinez , who was dropped from fifth to sixth in the order during the american league championship series against the cleveland indians and will remain in that spot until further notice . </s><s> martinez has blamed his paucity of production on impatience and on trying to do too much . </s><s> he has sometimes flailed at poor pitches during hitter 's counts of 3-1 and 2-0 , instead of working the count , and he has admitted that his previous failures in the post-season have caused him to pursue the obviously unattainable five-run homer . </s><s> actually , martinez has already made some alterations , and he has reached base 7 times in his last 10 plates appearances on a double , a single , a hit-by-pitch and 4 walks . </s><s> it is not enough to pacify george steinbrenner , but it is something for him to cling to . </s><s> until last night , anyway , when martinez had to face kevin brown , a nasty right-hander who had retired him in 30 of 34 career at-bats . </s><s> `` if i was getting good pitches and missing them , then i 'd say i have a bad swing working , '' said martinez . </s><s> `` but i 've been swinging at bad pitches . </s><s> right now , i 've just got to be patient and wait . '' </s><s> the yankees will wait with him . </s><s> in the 1996 world series , torre started cecil fielder over martinez at first in games 3 , 4 and 5 . </s><s> it was a difficult decision because martinez had paced the team in rbi while fielder did not join the yankees until july 31 . </s><s> but the yankees grabbed all three games so it worked . </s><s> torre does not have such an attractive replacement this season in luis sojo . </s><s> so the yankees will stay with martinez , for better or worse , while he tries to stay positive and finally produce . </s><s> `` it 's the world series , '' said martinez . </s><s> `` you got to go out there and have fun with it . </s><s> big games are all big games . </s><s> you want to go out there and enjoy that game and try to do your best to win that game . </s><s> you do n't think that you might lose that day . first world series game	knoblauch martinez power yankee padre world series opener	knoblauch  martinez redeem self  give yankee 96 win 1st series game	knoblauch  martinez  threerun home run  world series  grand slam  game 1	chuck knoblauch and tino martinez were as popular as squeegee men a week ago , the speculation rampant that one or the other or both might be exiled if the yankees ' historic year crumbled in the post-season . </s><s> two big hits in the midst of a big inning changed all that saturday night in game 1 of the world series . </s><s> the yankees trailed san diego , 5-2 , in the seventh inning , but knoblauch hit a three-run home run to tie the score , and five batters later , martinez smashed a grand slam . </s><s> the seven-run explosion rocketed the yankees to a 9-6 victory in the opener of the four-of-seven-game series , before 56,712 at yankee stadium . </s><s> orlando hernandez will pitch against andy ashby in game 2 sunday night at the stadium . </s><s> beyond seizing the advantage in the series , the yankees were able to neutralize the padres ' ace , kevin brown , driving him from the mound in the seventh . </s><s> brown , seen by many as san diego 's best hope for a world series upset , will not pitch again until game 4 , at the earliest . </s><s> brown was pitching with a three-run lead after the top of the fifth , when tony gwynn and greg vaughn banged back-to-back homers . </s><s> one out into the seventh , however , jorge posada hit a single , and brown walked ricky ledee . </s><s> brown , who had thrown a whopping 64 pitches in the first three innings , went out , and the reliever donne wall came in to face knoblauch . </s><s> this is what the yankees have done all season , force a starter from the game in the middle innings , before exploiting a middle reliever . </s><s> knoblauch , of course , had earned notoriety for his gaffe in the game 2 of the american league championship series against cleveland , standing and waiting for an interference call as the ball rolled to a stop behind him and the decisive run scored . </s><s> the yankees came back to win the series , however ; knoblauch got a reprieve and talked about how much the experience had helped him . </s><s> facing wall with a one-ball , no-strike count , knoblauch had to duck under a runaway fastball . </s><s> two balls , no strikes . </s><s> wall had to throw a strike , knoblauch swung hard and lifted a high fly down the left-field line . </s><s> off the bat , it did not look like much . </s><s> but it kept carrying , vaughn drifting back in left and looking up , to see the ball disappear into the stands . </s><s> tie game . </s><s> yankee stadium shook . </s><s> knoblauch rounded the bases , crossed home plate and thrust both arms into the air , yelling to the crowd , like a hyped olympic weightlifter who had just successfully hoisted a half-ton . </s><s> he stomped around the dugout , his helmet on , teammates banging on him happily . </s><s> when derek jeter singled , nobody really noticed . </s><s> wall left the game , and mark langston took over . </s><s> paul o'neill flied out , and after jeter advanced on a wild pitch , bernie williams was intentionally walked . </s><s> chili davis drew a walk . </s><s> bases loaded , once more , with martinez coming to the plate , with exactly one run batted in in his first 76 career at-bats in league championship and world series games . </s><s> with the count two balls and two strikes , langston threw a pitch near the outside corner that he thought should have been a strike . </s><s> instead , garcia called it a ball . </s><s> langston glared , snapping at the return throw . </s><s> langston and martinez and everyone on the field now understood that with the bases loaded and a 3-2 count , langston would have to throw what players refer to as a cookie _ a tasty pitch over the middle . </s><s> martinez ate up this cookie . </s><s> the ball soared into the upper deck in right field , lifting three years of post-season misery off the back of the yankees ' first baseman , a grand slam . </s><s> the crowd called out martinez from the dugout again . </s><s> like knoblauch , martinez pumped both arms , and later the crowd would chant his name , and martinez would wave his cap . </s><s> san diego 's lead was long gone . </s><s> the yankees had taken a 2-0 lead over brown in the second inning , forcing him to throw 32 pitches in the second . </s><s> they loaded the bases with a single and two walks , and ledee , the rookie left fielder who is playing because none of torre 's left fielders have been hitting , pulled a sinking fastball down the right field line with two outs . </s><s> the fans along the foul line stood , some waving to push the ball fair with the body english , and the ball landed on the line , skipping off the wall as two runners scored . </s><s> the yankees had the early edge , they had jumped on brown , and they had their best pitcher on the mound . </s><s> san diego 's chris gomez led off the second inning with a blooper over shortstop , the ball falling in for a single . </s><s> quilvio veras flied to right , gwynn grounded out and gomez took second , bringing vaughn to the plate . </s><s> david wells got ahead in the count , no balls and two strikes , with a change-up and a fastball , before trying to run a fastball inside on vaughn , who hit 50 home runs during the regular season . </s><s> vaughn attacked the pitch : a line drive that landed in the second deck , foul all the way , but a frightening mistake . </s><s> jorge posada , the yankees ' catcher , jogged to the mound to re-think the strategy , perhaps to remind wells of the conventional wisdom : you must pitch vaughn on the outer edge of the plate . </s><s> posada returned to the plate , called for an outside fastball , wells threw . </s><s> vaughn 's swing was short and quick , the ball making a click sound off the bat , like a well-struck golf ball , before carrying over the wall in right-center field . </s><s> tie game . </s><s> wells retired the first two batters in the fifth inning , before jamming veras with an inside fastball . </s><s> veras ' bat snapped on contact , but it was enough to send a looper into short center field , a single . </s><s> gwynn stepped in , having hit a single in his first two at-bats , and looked for a sign from the third base coach tim flannery . </s><s> with a runner on first , he likes to try to pull a ball through the right side of the infield . </s><s> wells fired a fastball , gwynn turned on the pitch and ripped it , a line drive that crashed off the facing of the upper deck in right field . </s><s> the padres jumped from the dugout , celebrating , as wells turned away , disgusted , asking for a new baseball . </s><s> he got one , delivered another fastball , and vaughn slugged this deep into the left field stands . </s><s> two pitches , two home runs , the first back-to-back home runs allowed by wells since april 30 . </s><s> san diego led , 5-2 , and yankee stadium was silent . </s><s> it would not stay that way .	knoblauch and martinez home run hits cinch prescription contraceptive woman	agreement contraception coverage could scuttle spending bill	budget report okay insurance coverage birth control  bill stall	thorny federal election commission provision threaten spending bill	house and senate negotiators agreed thursday to require most federal health plans to cover prescription contraceptives for women , giving an unusual victory on capitol hill to advocates of abortion rights . </s><s> but the future of the measure was in doubt because it was attached to a spending bill that includes a controversial provision regarding the federal election commission . </s><s> that provision could scuttle the spending bill , which would finance the treasury department and the postal service and which still must be approved by the house and senate . </s><s> the contraceptive measure would require the federal health plans , which affect 1.2 million female federal employees who are of child-bearing age , to cover the five methods of contraception that have been approved by the food and drug administration for use in this country _ birth control pills , diaphragms , inter-uterine devices , norplant and depo-provera . </s><s> currently , only 19 percent of federal health plans cover those methods . </s><s> the house and senate approved the contraceptive measure earlier this year . </s><s> but the opponents of abortion were furious about the approval and persuaded republican leaders to have negotiators reopen discussion on the matter . </s><s> the cost of contraceptives has driven up the out-of-pocket cost of health care for women . </s><s> and many male members of congress seemed persuaded to support coverage of contraceptives for women , since almost all of the 285 federal health plans cover viagra , the male impotency drug . </s><s> thursday , with pressure building to resolve the spending bills before oct. 9 , when temporary financing of the government expires , the negotiators agreed to include the contraceptive measure in their conference report on the $ 13.4 billion bill for the treasury department and postal service . </s><s> rep. nita lowey , d-n.y. , who pushed the contraceptive measure through the house , hailed thursday 's agreement as the first major accomplishment by abortion rights advocates since the republicans took control of congress in 1994 . </s><s> she said the negotiators had agreed to include the measure because in an election year they did not want to be perceived as opposing contraception or be seen as rejecting a measure that had passed both the house and senate . </s><s> but many democrats said the were upset that the bill contains a provision that is seen as interfering with the independence of the federal election commission . </s><s> that provision would require a four-vote majority among the seven federal election commissioners every four years to retain the general counsel and staff director . </s><s> the provision is aimed at getting rid of lawrence noble , the current general counsel , who has investigated the campaign finance practices of groups like the christian coalition . </s><s> the contraceptive measure is one of four related matters that have helped stall four spending bills . </s><s> the three other bills that are stalled in part because of abortion-related matters include the agriculture bill , in which there is a dispute over whether the federal food and drug administration should use taxpayer money to approve drugs like ru-486 , which induce abortions . </s><s> the foreign operations bill is also stalled over whether to finance international family planning programs that may also promote abortion , while the labor and health bill is delayed because of a provision that would block access of minors to contraception . </s><s> addressing the measure on insurance coverage for contraceptives , helen alvarez , a spokeswoman for the national conference of catholic bishops , said that the bill was bad policy . </s><s> she said contraception had failed to stem the number of abortions , teen-age pregnancies or out-of-wedlock births . </s><s> `` public-relations-wise , it 's a good tactic for them , '' she conceded , `` but in terms of social policy , this is a failure . ''	agreement reached to provide prescription contraceptives to women	agreement on contraception coverage could scuttle spending bill	budget report okays insurance coverage of birth control ; other bills stall .	thorny federal election commission provision threatens spending bill

veto likely	alaskan wilderness road provision may attach spending bill	voting mainly on party lines on a question that has become a touchstone in the debate over development and preservation of wilderness , the senate on thursday approved a gravel road through remote wildlife habitat in alaska . </s><s> the road , barely 30 miles long , would slice across the edge of a wildlife refuge and wilderness area on the aleutian peninsula , where it would connect an isolated village called king cove to a long-range air strip in the town of cold bay . </s><s> without the road , its backers say , about 700 residents of king cove must continue to use unreliable air and boat service in emergencies , often risking dangerous winds and seas as they seek medical evacuation to anchorage . </s><s> opponents of the road call the project an unjustifiable precedent that threatens the seasonal breeding grounds of protected migratory birds , and they say that improved air or sea service would be a better alternative . </s><s> the vote thursday , 59-38 , was a victory for the state 's congressional delegation . </s><s> but with president clinton likely to veto the measure , the final outcome may depend on whether its sponsors can insert the road proposal into a huge spending bill that is likely to emerge just before congress heads home for the nov. 3 elections . </s><s> three republicans voted against the bill , and six democrats voted for it . </s><s> the clinton administration has repeatedly warned that it will veto a big spending bill if it contains an array of anti-environmental provisions that are under consideration . </s><s> indeed , the white house seems to be itching for a partisan fight over environmental priorities . </s><s> but while many republicans in congress still appear reluctant to engage in that broad fight , they were willing thursday to cast their lot with the senate 's two powerful alaskans , ted stevens and frank murkowski , both republicans . </s><s> a companion bill in the house , sponsored by rep. don young of alaska , also a republican , has not come to the floor . </s><s> even sen. john chafee of rhode island , a leader of republican environmentalists , voted for the road . </s><s> last february chafee 's staff had assembled a score of environmental lobbyists in his office to plan strategy for opposing the road , environmental advocates said thursday . </s><s> they speculated that the senator had changed his position out of deference to the power of stevens , who as chairman of the appropriations committee exerts tremendous influence at a time when a dozen spending bills are in their final stages . </s><s> a chafee aide said chafee voted reluctantly for the road after alaska 's senators convinced him of its merits . </s><s> stevens said in angry tones thursday that two-thirds of alaska 's land was off limits to development and that vital health services were being denied to his state 's residents . </s><s> `` we ca n't use it without permission from some bureaucrat who is compelled by extreme environmentalists , '' he said . </s><s> `` they are so extreme that they say this 330,000-acre izembek refuge , the smallest wilderness in alaska , is so sacrosanct that it ca n't move its border 60 feet . '' </s><s> but sen. dale bumpers , d-ark. , called the road project a dangerous precedent . </s><s> `` building a road through a wilderness in alaska , no matter how short or how long , would be the first time in the nation we have voted deliberately to authorize a road through a wilderness area , '' bumpers said . </s><s> `` and once you go down that road , nobody knows where it is going to end . ''	clinton likely to veto measure to build road across alaska wildlife refuge	budget including road through alaskan wildlife refuge risks clinton veto	senate approves 30-mile road in alaskan wilderness ; precedent ?  veto likely .	alaskan wilderness road provision may be attached to spending bill

appropriation bill split republican	congressional republican  democrat work resolve issue budget	negotiator likely extend 3rd deadline  clinton push education fund	education main topic budget talk  7 bill need  ideology forefront	clinton  100000 teacher  bowles  omnibus package  miller  armey  ideology	top-level budget negotiators for congressional republicans and the white house concluded yet another bargaining session late sunday afternoon with plans to resume talks on monday morning and probably extend their midnight monday deadline for another day or two . </s><s> both sides were amiable as they emerged from a two-hour session , but they had little to report and indicated that their relatively early departure , compared with the last three nights , should not be interpreted as a sign of crisis or of imminent peace in the budget talks . </s><s> sunday 's discussions focused on education and president clinton 's request for $ 1.1 billion to hire 100,000 teachers , but aides said the bargainers did not delve into much detail and nothing was resolved . </s><s> `` i think we made some real progress today , but we still have a significant difference in the area of education , '' said erskine bowles , clinton 's chief of staff and top negotiator , after sunday 's meeting . </s><s> `` we 're going to try to plow through that over the next two days . '' </s><s> asked how far apart the two sides were on education , rep. dick armey of texas , the republican majority leader , replied : `` i do n't know . </s><s> we 're not together . '' </s><s> he said the two sides had made `` some progress , but not enough . '' </s><s> the talks came during another day of escalated political confrontation as congressional democrats and republicans , painfully aware that they have three weeks until election day , tried to take advantage of the static budget situation . </s><s> congress has passed only six of the 13 required spending bills and are negotiating now with the white house on a final omnibus package that will contain the remaining seven bills and major issues including how to conduct the census in the year 2000 , how much money to provide the international monetary fund and under what conditions it should be provided , and how much emergency money to provide for items like increased security at u.s. embassies around the world and for american farmers . </s><s> also to be resolved are a host of issues that have little to do with financing and more to do with ideology , including environmental matters , contraception and national student testing . </s><s> republicans said the president had been disengaged from the process , and they were irked at what they said was his swooping in at the 11th hour and pushing his education agenda in an apparently successful portrayal of himself as the guardian of that popular topic . </s><s> democrats countered that the republican-led congress had done nothing all year , and cast the republicans as extremists for blocking the president 's plea for more money to hire teachers and modernize schools . </s><s> in fact , republican bargainers said saturday night that they would provide the money if local governments , not washington , could decide how the money would be used . </s><s> armey was one of many who castigated the president for apparent disengagement , an indirect reminder that clinton has been steeped in a sex scandal and is facing an impeachment inquiry in the house . </s><s> the scant number of congressional republicans who did not leave town for the weekend used the house floor to press this same message . </s><s> `` what about the president ? '' </s><s> asked rep. tom delay of texas , the majority whip . </s><s> `` maybe in martha 's vineyard ? </s><s> aspen ? </s><s> camp david ? </s><s> where is the president ? </s><s> i bet the american people do n't know that he spent 152 days out of the 283 days this year fund raising , traveling and on vacation . '' </s><s> republicans said that clinton had participated in 98 fund-raising events so far this year and that two events on monday in new york , supporting the senate campaign of rep. charles schumer , would bring him to 100 . </s><s> clinton said at the white house that he was `` prepared to do whatever it takes '' to reach a resolution over the spending bills , and dispatched his aides to capitol hill . </s><s> he also said he would postpone from monday morning until monday afternoon his departure for his fund-raising tour in new york , and he canceled a fund-raising appearance in florida . </s><s> but as the high-level budget bargaining concluded sunday afternoon , both sides agreed they would need to extend their deadline beyond midnight monday , when temporary financing for the government expires for the third time since the oct. 1 start of the fiscal year . </s><s> congressional democrats struck back at the republicans , saying they have held a slack schedule themselves . </s><s> rep. george miller , d-calif. , said congress had been in session only 108 days so far this year , an unusually abbreviated period and one consumed for more than a month by the drive to hold impeachment hearings on the president . </s><s> most americans , miller said , had worked more than 225 days . </s><s> `` they say , `where is the president ? ' '' </s><s> miller said . </s><s> `` the president has been waiting for the budget . </s><s> this is the first congress since 1974 that has no budget , '' he said , referring to the broad blueprint that is supposed to guide spending . </s><s> `` this is a congress that ca n't pass seven of its appropriations bills , '' he said , largely because of divisive splits among conservative and moderate republicans .	congressional republicans , democrats work to resolve issues on budget	negotiators likely to extend 3rd deadline .  clinton pushes education funds .	education main topic budget talks ; 7 bills needed ; ideologies at forefront .	clinton , 100,000 teachers , bowles , omnibus package , miller , armey , ideology

sampling 2000 census snag budget bill  6month money	2000 census  sample  supreme court  halfyear financing  commerce  bowles	a sticking point for white house and congressional budget negotiators has been the issue of how the 2000 census will be conducted , and the white house is finding itself negotiating on the issue as much with house democrats as it is with the house republican leaders . </s><s> on monday , white house negotiators , led by chief of staff erskine bowles , tried to determine whether democrats would accept a deal to finance for six months the departments of state , justice and commerce , which oversees the census bureau . </s><s> the deal would put off until next march the contentious issue of whether the next census would use statistical sampling to supplement traditional methods of counting people . </s><s> bowles told the group of democrats that the house republicans were willing to give on a number of outstanding issues that were stalling final agreement on the budget , but that they were digging in their heels when it came to financing the census for six months . </s><s> the democrats met in the office of minority leader dick gephardt . </s><s> the rationale for the half-year financing is that by next march the supreme court is expected to rule on whether using sampling is legal or constitutional . </s><s> the supreme court has already agreed to review two lower court rulings that said sampling would violate federal law . </s><s> oral arguments on the cases are set for november . </s><s> but house democrats balked at the idea of six months ' financing for the census , arguing that even if the supreme court allowed sampling , the republicans would be under no obligation to approve money for a census that included sampling . </s><s> `` the general feeling among many democrats was that even if we won the case , there would be a lot less leverage in march , especially if it was the only issue left to be debated , '' said a house democratic official who insisted on anonymity . </s><s> democrats contend that now is the time to press the republicans , while they want to complete work on the budget and go home to campaign . </s><s> rep. lucille roybal-allard , d-calif. , who attended the meeting monday , said , `` it was , sort of , this is where we are . </s><s> we 've been able to accomplish great things , what do you think ? </s><s> we made it very clear that unless the census was included , along with some other issues , like school construction , the deal would n't be acceptable . '' </s><s> statistical sampling would allow the census bureau to estimate populations that are difficult to count , and would have the largest effect on the counting of african-americans in cities and blacks and hispanics in rural areas , groups that are traditionally undercounted by the standard means . </s><s> republicans fear , and democrats hope , that the method would raise the count of people living in traditionally democratic areas , giving the party an advantage when new boundaries for election districts are drawn following the 2000 census . </s><s> at monday 's meeting , the democrats reminded administration officials that clinton had promised that he would veto any legislation that restricted the census bureau 's ability to conduct an accurate census . </s><s> `` i ca n't think of any way that restricts the census more than not to fully fund it , '' said rep. carolyn maloney , d-n.y . </s><s> the willingness of house democrats , including gephardt , to press the president on the issue represents a realization of their leverage with clinton , who will need all of their support in the coming impeachment inquiry . </s><s> `` gephardt is a major player now , and the irony is we helped make him that , '' said rep. christopher shays , r-conn. , who supports the use of sampling in the census . </s><s> the democrats ' position also indicates how little trust many have in the white house on this issue . </s><s> the proposal to finance the departments of commerce , justice and state for six months is similar to one reached last november between bowles and house speaker newt gingrich . </s><s> the idea then was that holding all three departments hostage in the census fight would place maximum pressure on all sides to work out their differences over sampling . </s><s> but house democrats were not consulted before that agreement was struck and later grumbled about it . </s><s> at a meeting of the democratic caucus tuesday , ms. maloney briefed lawmakers on dealings with the white house and declared that clinton had promised that he would hold firm on the census and that she believed him , a participant said . </s><s> the statement was greeted with laughter . </s><s> `` there is a certain level of suspicion because there have been times when we have been cut out , ''said the house democratic official . </s><s> `` but i have to say , there has n't been much evidence of that , this time . ''	budget talks on 2000 census a sticking point for both sides of the house	statistical sampling in census sticking point in budget negotiations	statistical sampling in 2000 census snags budget bill ; 6-month money an out	2000 census , sampling , supreme court , half-year financing , commerce , bowles

education budget  budget delayed	school aid  census  contraceptives big issue 4th deadline nears	budget fight continue education  2000 census  contraceptive coverage	fourth deadline  federal budget  100000 teacher  beltway bureaucrat	struggling to meet their fourth deadline over the federal budget , congressional republicans and white house officials wrestled tuesday with their differences over education , staging events to demonstrate support for what has become the most public and politically high-stakes element of the budget battle . </s><s> negotiators met into the night to hash out their disagreements over aid for schools , the census and contraceptives . </s><s> these were among the biggest issues that still separated the two sides as each tried to formulate a message to take home to voters for the nov. 3 elections . </s><s> on education , the issue that president clinton has propelled to the forefront of the talks and on which republicans do not want to appear recalcitrant , both sides have agreed to spend more than $ 1 billion but disagree over how to spend it . </s><s> the president insists the money be spent on hiring 100,000 teachers across the country so that the average class can be reduced to 18 students . </s><s> republicans , railing against `` beltway bureaucrats , '' say that local school districts should decide how the money is spent , whether it be for teachers or computers . </s><s> the two sides remained apart on several ideological matters , including whether to allow federal health plans to cover contraceptives and whether to allow those few plans with religious affiliations to refuse to cover contraceptives not only on religious grounds but on moral grounds as well . </s><s> and they also were split on how to conduct the census in the year 2000 . </s><s> this is one of the thorniest issues . </s><s> it is not one that moves voters , but it is vital to both parties because it helps determine their relative strength in congress . </s><s> house speaker newt gingrich and erskine bowles , the president 's chief of staff and top negotiator , met for much of the day in the speaker 's office , shuttling in and out of ante-rooms with their lieutenants but giving few clues about the nitty gritty details of their talks . </s><s> they have given themselves another deadline of midnight wednesday to wrap up about $ 500 billion-worth of spending items , but they could easily extend that deadline another day or two . </s><s> they missed the oct. 1 start of the fiscal year , providing temporary funding for the federal government through oct. 9 , then oct. 12 , then wednesday . </s><s> some of the other central issues , such as financing for the international monetary fund , were all but nailed down , but neither side was ready to declare a final deal until all the other elements of the budget package are in place . </s><s> `` we 're down to splitting infinitives , '' rep. dick armey of texas , the republican majority leader , said of approving funds for the international fund . </s><s> as they worked through several issues , republican leaders appeared to be calculating the differences in their own party that might sour a final deal when it arrives on the house floor _ more of a concern than on the senate floor because the senate has fewer differences among its republicans and with the white house .	republicans , white house at odds on education budget , budget delayed	school aid , census , contraceptives biggest issues as 4th deadline nears	budget fights continue over education , 2000 census , contraceptive coverage .	fourth deadline , federal budget , 100,000 teachers , beltway bureaucrats

's doctors have pronounced his health `` more or less normal , '' his wife naina said in an interview published wednesday . </s><s> mrs. yeltsin told the argumenty i fakty weekly that she hesitated even to touch on her husband 's health `` when there is so much conjecture on this topic . '' </s><s> still , she noted that he had regular medical check-ups . </s><s> `` the doctors say now : everything is more or less normal , '' mrs. yeltsin declared . </s><s> the 67-year-old yeltsin 's health has long been a concern , and the worry has been amplified by the secrecy surrounding his condition . </s><s> yeltsin suffered from heart disease during the 1996 presidential election and had a heart attack , followed by multiple bypass surgery , in the months after his victory . </s><s> mrs. yeltsin expressed understanding for russians who took part wednesday in protests for unpaid wages . </s><s> she also said that criticism of the president was normal , though it was offensive when it focused on anything other than his professional performance , such as his age . </s><s> `` it seems to me ... that people expected a miracle from him , '' mrs. yeltsin said . </s><s> `` but surely you ca n't curse a person for not being a magician . '' </s><s> mrs. yeltsin refuted rumors that her family would leave russia after yeltsin leaves office in 2000 as `` absolute nonsense . '' </s><s> `` i think we 'll live like all normal people . </s><s> at least it will be calmer than it is now . health	yeltsin show sign illness first trip russia since spring	yeltsin health cancel 3 uzbek ceremony  appear stiff stumble	yeltsin travel ssrs  meet president  cancel ceremony  cold	president boris yeltsin , on his first trip out of russia since this spring , canceled a welcoming ceremony in uzbekistan on sunday because he was n't feeling well , his spokesman said . </s><s> yeltsin appeared stiff and stumbled during another public ceremony after he arrived in tashkent , the capital of this central asian nation , and had to be supported by uzbek president islam karimov . </s><s> but the two later held a one-on-one summit as scheduled . </s><s> the trip is yeltsin 's first high-profile foray since an economic crisis swamped his country in august . </s><s> the 67-year-old president , whose health has often sidelined him during his seven years in power , has spent most of the last two months out of the limelight and out of the kremlin , holding meetings in his country home outside moscow . </s><s> his last foreign trip was to britain in may , when he attended a summit of the group of seven leading industrial nations . </s><s> during his visits to uzbekistan and kazakstan this week , yeltsin is expected to discuss improving russia 's relations with the two former soviet republics , whose economies have suffered residual effects of the crisis that hit russia after it devalued its currency in august and defaulted on some of its debt . </s><s> on sunday , yeltsin had been scheduled to lay wreaths at a monument to alisher naboi , an 16th century uzbek poet , and salute an uzbek honor guard , but both ceremonies were canceled . </s><s> `` this week was extremely tense . </s><s> ( yeltsin ) was affected by a difficult flight and the end of a difficult week , '' yeltsin 's chief spokesman , dmitry yakushkin , told a news conference . </s><s> `` he has a cold . </s><s> he was coughing when we spoke . '' </s><s> it was sunny and about 14 degrees c ( 57 degrees f ) in tashkent on sunday . </s><s> yakushkin said yeltsin 's schedule monday may also change depending on how he feels . </s><s> yeltsin and karimov later met at a government residence outside tashkent and signed several agreements on fighting smuggling and other crime and expanding cultural ties . </s><s> the two sides are expected to sign economic agreements monday . </s><s> later monday , yeltsin is to go to kazakstan , where he and kazak president nursultan nazarbayev are expected to sign agreements on economic , science and technical cooperation and on combating drug trafficking . </s><s> last week , yeltsin said he also planned to discuss the situation in afghanistan with his uzbek and kazak counterparts . </s><s> russia and the two republics fear an influx of refugees and weapons from afghanistan , and possibly a spillover of fighting that has wracked the country . </s><s> yeltsin was accompanied by foreign minister igor ivanov , defense minister igor sergeyev , finance minister mikhail zadornov , officials from the federal border guard service , the state customs committee , the defense ministry , and the russian academy of sciences .	yeltsin 's canceling uzbekistan ceremony raises concern about his health	yeltsin shows signs of illness on first trip out of russia since spring	yeltsin health canceled 3 uzbek ceremonies .  appears stiff and stumbled .	yeltsin travels to ssrs ; met with presidents ; cancel ceremonies ; has cold .

boris yeltsin cut short a trip to central asia on monday due to a respiratory infection that revived questions about his overall health and ability to lead russia through a sustained economic crisis . </s><s> yeltsin 's premature return to moscow also prompted doubts about his capacity to respond decisively in the kosovo crisis , in which russia has been leading a campaign to forestall airstrikes . </s><s> moscow 's ntv station said it was a crucial time for russia , when `` presidential decisions '' are needed . </s><s> there was no indication that yeltsin 's illness would sideline him for any length of time , and aides said the president would maintain his schedule for the rest of the week . </s><s> but after a series of health problems in recent years , including heart bypass surgery in 1996 , every new ailment unleashes a flurry of speculation about the president 's ability to function . </s><s> the president insists he has no major health problems and will serve out the remaining two years of his term . </s><s> yeltsin 's aides said the president was taking antibiotics to ward off a bout of bronchitis and a mild fever of 37.4 celsius ( 99.3 fahrenheit ) . </s><s> there were no plans to hospitalize yeltsin , who arrived in moscow late monday night from almaty , kazakstan , a day earlier than planned .	respiratory infection cuts short yeltsin trip to central asia	yeltsin 's resignation	yeltsin rambling  confuse state dinner  mild fever  need bed rest	yeltsin bed  call cold  rumor rampant  want xfer power	president boris yeltsin stayed home tuesday , nursing a respiratory infection that forced him to cut short a foreign trip and revived concerns about his ability to govern . </s><s> yeltsin was spending the day at his gorky-9 country residence just outside moscow , and will probably not go into the office all week , his spokesman , dmitry yakushkin , told reporters . </s><s> however , yeltsin 's condition was stable , yakushkin said . </s><s> doctors insisted monday that yeltsin fly home from central asia a day ahead of schedule because he was suffering from an upper respiratory infection and had a mild fever of 37.4 celsius ( 99.3 f ) . </s><s> they said yeltsin was being treated with antibiotics and there were no plans to hospitalize him . </s><s> yeltsin , 67 , has a history of health problems , including quintuple heart bypass surgery two years ago , so whenever he gets sick there is a flurry of speculation about his ability to function . </s><s> yeltsin insists he has no major illness and plans to serve out the remaining two years of his term . </s><s> yakushkin , his spokesman , reiterated tuesday there was no talk about an early resignation . </s><s> `` it 's not being discussed , '' he said . </s><s> `` i am personally against such a resignation because i think it would only bring peril to the nation . '' </s><s> yakushkin and other aides sought to play down the seriousness of yeltsin 's illness . </s><s> `` do n't panic , dad is ok , '' yeltsin 's daughter tatiana dyachenko , who is his official image adviser , told the kommersant business newspaper . </s><s> yakushkin said yeltsin 's personal doctor , sergei mironov , confirmed that the president was suffering from a respiratory infection known as tracheal bronchitis and that `` his condition is stable . '' </s><s> `` he must stay in bed like any other person , '' yakushkin said . </s><s> `` however , knowing the president 's character , he is certain to start working with documents and making phone calls to russian politicians as well as foreign leaders in view of the current situation in kosovo . '' </s><s> but the nezavisimaya gazeta newspaper said in a front-page editorial tuesday that yeltsin 's condition suggests he is suffering from something worse than a cold . </s><s> it said his absence from the kremlin during the current economic crisis `` amounts to a state catastrophe '' and called on yeltsin to immediately surrender most of his powers to prime minister yevgeny primakov . </s><s> a communist lawmaker also called for `` an urgent medical check ... on the russian president 's health '' to determine whether he is fit to remain in office , the interfax news agency said . </s><s> `` yeltsin 's obvious inability to perform his functions is damaging russian state authority , as power is being misused by the clique close to the president , '' said viktor ilyukhin , chairman of parliament 's security committee . </s><s> the health of the president , who is also commander-in-chief of the russian military , `` is a direct threat to the country 's national security and a factor of serious concern regarding russia 's nuclear weapons , '' he said . </s><s> other newspapers gave a detailed description of yeltsin 's weaknesses and his erratic behavior on the trip to the former soviet republics of uzbekistan and kazakstan _ his first foray abroad since a visit to britain in may . </s><s> the president appeared stiff and stumbled when he arrived sunday in uzbekistan 's capital of tashkent . </s><s> he had to be supported by uzbek president islam karimov and canceled his other public events . </s><s> at a state dinner on sunday , yeltsin made rambling remarks , expressing his satisfaction with local `` facilities and stores '' he never inspected , the daily kommersant reported . </s><s> on monday , `` the president did n't seem to understand that he was n't in moscow , '' kommersant said , saying he called aides and spoke as though they were late for work at the kremlin . </s><s> he turned up more than an hour late for talks with uzbek officials , making some incoherent remarks interrupted by a bad cough and abruptly cutting short a scheduled news conference .	yeltsin 's poor health raises question about his ability to denies seriously ill government gradually take	yeltsin wan tire  defies rest order  resignation urge due health	yeltsin defies mds go work  say okay  lose power  favor  pity	weakened by a cold yet animated , president boris yeltsin defied doctors ' orders and quashed rumors he is seriously ill by showing up unexpectedly at the kremlin on wednesday . </s><s> still , his appearance did n't silence the growing number of calls for his resignation . </s><s> hours after he returned to work , the generally pro-yeltsin upper house of parliament fell just 11 votes short of passing a motion urging him to step down over his social welfare policies . </s><s> yeltsin , 67 , has a respiratory infection that forced him to cut short his first foreign visit in months on monday . </s><s> whenever yeltsin falls ill , speculation arises about his ability to govern . </s><s> this time , however , the prospect of him leaving office has aroused less panic , since he has largely faded from the limelight in recent months and left his government to grapple with russia 's economic crisis . </s><s> `` there will be no turmoil if yeltsin leaves the political arena . </s><s> the government is already in charge , ( prime minister yevgeny ) primakov is strong enough and has the support of the security services , '' said yevgeny volk , director of the moscow office of the u.s.-based heritage foundation . </s><s> `` everyone knows yeltsin is ailing and is politically weakened , '' he said . </s><s> yeltsin has a history of health problems , and underwent heart bypass surgery in 1996 . </s><s> still , he insists he has no major illnesses and plans to serve out the remaining two years of his term . </s><s> `` i ca n't even sneeze '' without someone making a fuss about it , he joked with primakov during a meeting wednesday . </s><s> in the kremlin , yeltsin discussed developments in kosovo with primakov , foreign minister igor ivanov and defense minister igor sergeyev , russian news agencies said . </s><s> yeltsin looked wan and tired and walked stiffly , but he was smiling , gesturing animatedly and joking with his ministers . </s><s> the start of the meeting was shown on russian television . </s><s> primakov said afterward that yeltsin waved his hand dismissively `` when we reminded him that he should stay in bed during his illness '' and said of his doctors : `` do n't listen to them . '' </s><s> the upper house of parliament was busy voting on a motion saying he should resign . </s><s> the vote in the federation council , which is made up of regional leaders , was 79 to 18 in favor , russian news agencies reported . </s><s> it did not pass because it required a simple majority of 90 votes . </s><s> the motion carries no legal weight , but it reflects growing anti-yeltsin sentiment in a chamber that has generally supported him . </s><s> the prime minister reiterated wednesday that yeltsin has no plans to resign or call early elections . </s><s> `` there is no reason for rocking the boat and demanding anyone 's resignation , '' primakov said , according to the interfax news agency . </s><s> `` what happens to the anti-crisis steps if elections are held now ? '' </s><s> yeltsin 's resignation is highly unlikely . </s><s> if he were to step down or die , primakov would take power and elections would have to be held within three months . </s><s> many russians view yeltsin with increasing pity . </s><s> `` i feel for him . </s><s> he 's clearly not a healthy person , '' film director vladimir khotinenko was quoted as saying by the daily kommersant . </s><s> `` it 's time for him to step aside . '' </s><s> doctors ordered the president to stay in bed tuesday and his spokesman , dmitry yakushkin , had said yeltsin would not be in the office all week . </s><s> yeltsin stumbled and had to be supported during his visit to central asia on sunday and monday . </s><s> he canceled most of his public engagements , except for a state dinner at which he made rambling remarks and a news conference that he abruptly cut short .	yeltsin defies doctors to go to kremlin ; but is politically weakened	yeltsin denies he is seriously ill but government is gradually taking over	yeltsin wan and tired , defies rest order .  resignation urged due to health .	yeltsin defies mds and goes to work ; says okay ; lost power , favor ; pitied .

opposition want early resignation	yeltsin physically weak  say wo nt seek another term president	russian court study 3d yeltsin term obe  s lost power  ill  wo nt run	russia 's constitutional court opened hearings thursday on whether boris yeltsin can seek a third term . </s><s> the issue was controversial earlier this year when yeltsin refused to spell out his intentions and his aides insisted he had the legal right to seek re-election . </s><s> it has lost some of its urgency , as yeltsin has grown physically and politically weaker and has said he will not run again . </s><s> the russian constitution has a two-term limit for presidents . </s><s> but yeltsin 's aides say his first term , from 1991 to 1996 , does not count because it began six months before the soviet union collapsed and before the current constitution took effect . </s><s> communists and other yeltsin opponents in parliament 's lower house , the state duma , disagreed and appealed to the constitutional court in february . </s><s> while the case has been waiting to be heard , events have overtaken it . </s><s> yeltsin has flatly said he will not seek another term , and the opposition has concentrated its efforts on demanding an early resignation , riding a wave of popular discontent over the economic crisis . </s><s> the call for yeltsin to step down was backed by many participants in a nationwide labor action earlier this month that attracted about 1 million people . </s><s> yeltsin 's growing health problems would also seem to rule out another election campaign . </s><s> a respiratory infection forced him to cut short a trip to central asia earlier this week . </s><s> on wednesday , parliament 's upper chamber , the federation council , voted on a resolution calling on yeltsin to resign , but it failed narrowly . </s><s> even if had passed , the move would have had no legal consequences , but it highlighted growing anti-yeltsin sentiments in the chamber made up of powerful regional leaders , most of whom have been loyal to the president . </s><s> mikhail mityukov , the presidential representative on the constitutional court , said thursday that yeltsin would ignore calls for an early resignation . </s><s> `` the president is a strong person , and he has been through far more difficult political situations , '' mityukov said , according to the interfax news agency .	russian court to decide if yeltsin could seek a third term	yeltsin not seeking another term but opposition wants early resignation	yeltsin physically weaker , says he wo n't seek another term as president	russian court study of 3d yeltsin term obe ; he 's lost power ; ill ; wo n't run

asian summit place	yeltsin cancel asian trip  go vienna  health rumor  able work	russian president boris yeltsin , who is still recuperating from his latest illness , has canceled a trip to an asian summit next month , his office said friday . </s><s> government sources said the president has also called off a visit to austria later this month , but the kremlin said those plans were still going forward . </s><s> yeltsin has decided to send prime minister yevgeny primakov to the november summit of the asia-pacific economic forum in kuala lumpur because it deals mostly with financial issues , yeltsin 's office said . </s><s> but sources in primakov 's office said the cancellation was due to concerns about how the long flight might effect the president 's health . </s><s> the president has been suffering from bronchitis and a cold this week , which forced him to cut short a visit to central asia on monday . </s><s> he was spending friday at a country home outside moscow after defying the orders of his doctors and working in the kremlin for the past two days . </s><s> aides said the president 's condition was `` satisfactory . '' </s><s> yeltsin is still planning to go to vienna for an oct. 27-28 summit of european nations , the president 's office said . </s><s> in another development , moscow mayor yuri luzhkov , considered a potential presidential candidate , said thursday that he would n't exclude the possibility of yeltsin 's resignation for health reasons . </s><s> in an interview with the british broadcasting corp. , he stopped short of calling on yeltsin to step down . </s><s> but luzhkov has always been supportive of yeltsin and had never before questioned the president 's health or ability to govern . </s><s> `` according to our constitution , the president himself has to say he is not able to work , '' luzhkov said in an interview with the bbc in moscow . </s><s> `` and because of ( yeltsin 's ) poor health , he is no longer able to give the country as much time as it demands . '' </s><s> luzhkov 's spokesman mikhail solomentsev refused to elaborate on the statement . </s><s> yeltsin has a long history of health problems , including a heart bypass surgery two years ago . </s><s> each new ailment rekindles speculation about his fitness to govern . </s><s> the president and his doctors say yeltsin has no serious health problems and will serve out the final two years of his term .	yeltsin cancels asian summit trip ; still plans to attend european summit	reports conflict over whether yeltsin will attend two out-of-area summits	yeltsin still recuperating , sends pm primakov to asian summit in his place	yeltsin cancels asian trip ; will go to vienna ; health rumors ; able to work ?
